This 3" x 4-1/2" wave-top pillar candle features a honeycomb textured wax coating on the outside, and a smooth wax coating on the inside with a flame shaped lightbulb. Directions:
Our timer pillars have two separate Äúon" functions. By switching to the Äú1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching to the Äú2" position, the timer function is activated.

The timer function means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on to repeat the cycle. The time that you originally flip the switch to the Äú2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the desired time.

This is a timer pillar. The On/Off switch is on the bottom. The timer function means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on to repeat the cycle. The time that you originally flip the switch to the "On" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the desired time.
Requires 3 AAA batteries (not included).

This 7" H x 3" W battery-operated pillar with a flame-shaped bulb that shines a white light is set in a dripped white wax sleeve.
Our timer pillars have two separate "on" functions. By switching the switch to the "1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching to the "2" position, the timer function is activated. This means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on for another 6 and off for 18, and so on. The time that you originally flip the switch to the "2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the time you wish for them to be set.
Uses 3 AAA batteries (not included).

Three assorted wooden blocks each measuring 4" x 4" in our new Stoneware colors: Pewter (charcoal gray), Stoneware (gray/beige) and Soft White (ivory). The blocks read:
Every love story is beautiful...
but ours is my favorite
When you realize that you want to spend
the rest of your life with somebody
you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible
When I saw you I fell in love
and you smiled because you knew

Pre-drilled keyhole in back for hanging if desired.

column4:
Blackboard measuring 12-1/2" H x 8-1/2" W with a rustic wood frame. Blackboard reads,

"Family Rules:
1. Forgiveness is mandatory
2. Always tell the truth
3. Have fun, be kind, no fussing, no whining
4. Encourage your siblings...share in their joy
5. Obey your parents
6. Husband - hug your wife daily & Wife - always be on his side
7. Use your manners - Yes Please...No, Thank You
8. Too much TV is bad...too much reading is good
9. Sing silly, dance crazy, hug often, say "I love you"
10. Be creative at all times
11. Keep your promises
12. Always give to others first
13. Never leave angry
14. Share everything, except bad ideas
15. Use nice words...ignore bad words
16. Bless your food, be grateful, eat together, clean up after yourself
17. Say your prayers...Thank God for this family"
column9: measuring 12-1/2" H x 8-1/2" W with a rustic wood frame.

column4:

"Home Rules:

3. Bear each others' burdens
4. Forgive and Forget
5. Be kind and tender hearted
6. Practice your patience
7. Give generously
8. Choose wisely
9. Comfort one another
10. Keep your promises
11. Look after one another
12. Do your best
13. Use kind words
14. Give thanks
15. Be supportive of one another
16. Laugh often
17. Eat more vegetables
18. Love one another"

column1: 3" X 4" Pumpkin Timer Pillar - Burnt Mustard
column4:
Our timer pillars have two separate Äúon" functions. By switching to the Äú1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching to the Äú2" position, the timer function is activated.
The timer function means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on to repeat the cycle. The time that you originally flip the switch to the Äú2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the desired time.

This candle has two separate Äúon" functions. By switching the switch to the Äú1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching the switch to the Äú2" position, the timer function is activated.
The timer function means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on for another 6 and off for 18, and so on. The time that you originally flip the switch to the Äú2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the time you wish for them to be set.

column4:
Our Barnside Lantern features a black metal frame with a glass hurricane globe. One of our wax-dipped timer tapers in Burnt Mustard is permanently affixed and turns on with a switch at the bottom of the lantern. Once on, it stays lit for 6 hours and then automatically shuts off for 18. Then the cycle repeats. To change the time cycle, simply turn off and turn on again at the desired time.
Measures 8" H x 4" W. Requires 3 AAA batteries (not included).

An assortment of 4 metal mason jar lids, each with a different farm animal sketch. There are two cows, a rooster and a sheep. A metal wire is attached for hanging. Adds a touch of farmhouse country to any setting! Each measures 3-1/2" in diameter.

This calendar consists of a wood plank that has that has been stained and slightly distressed with the words '"Family Birthdays" along with the months of year printed in burgundy and black. The calendar comes with a set of 24 wood coins, and extras can be purchased separately (item #32513).

Felix Cat is a primitive stuffed cat that is covered in charcoal gray cotton fabric. He is wearing gray and black herringbone fabric overalls with a red and black plaid flannel shirt. A black satin collar secured with a black button is around his neck and a long Santa stocking cap accented with a jingle bell is atop one of his pointed ears. In his arm he is carrying a red drawstring bag that holds some pine greenery and another stuffed cat that is adorned with a collar of jingle bells and a Santa stocking cap. With his stitched face, button eyes and string whiskers, Felix is ready to celebrate the holidays primitive style!

Distressing and rusty accents, along with a metal ball inside the bell that allows it to ring complete this rustic look. A jute string is attached for hanging.

This bell is made of distressed galvanized metal, with red trim around the bell's openings and rusty accents throughout for a totally rustic and vintage look. With a metal ball inside for sound, the finishing touch is a corrugated metal bow. A jute string is attached for hanging.

Ring in the holidays with this unique Rustic Red Metal Bell. This bell is made of distressed metal and painted red, with rusty accents along the edges for a totally rustic and vintage look. A good friend knows when to pour a glass of wine and talk it out, a great friend knows when to shut up and hand over the bottle.

Joanne Pumpkin Doll is a fabric doll with floppy arms and legs. She has an orange pumpkin head with a primitive face of stitched-on burlap patches accented by a wooden stick stem and a tuft of dried Sweet Annie. Her brown cotton dress has a swirl pattern and is accented with a primitive cotton apron and a tea stained cheesecloth collar. In her arms, she is holding a black stuffed crow that's accented with rusty jingle bells. The finishing touch is a craft paper name tag. Joanne truly adds a fun primitive twist to the fall season!
Measures 27" high by 9" wide.

Our Boo Ghost is a stuffed ghost made of starched fabric with color washed rosy cheeks. With black stitched eyes and mouth, Boo is also wearing a black beaded necklace that holds canvas tags that spell out the word "Boo." Add a cheesecloth cape and a jingle bell on the tip of her head and she's ready for her Halloween debut!
Boo Ghost measures 15" high by 7" wide.

Made from soft fabric, Snow Buddy wears a cozy fleece hat that is accented with red plaid fabric, and a matching scarf. He stands on two snowshoes made of wood that has been wrapped with jute rope, and carries a ski pole under each arm. The weighted doll measures 14" high by 5" wide and has a primitive name tag pinned to his scarf that reads "Snow Buddy".
Material: Fabric
Designer: Kitty Johnson
Dimensions: 14" H x 5" W
column9: measures 14" high by 5" wide and has a primitive name tag pinned to his scarf that reads "Snow Buddy".

column4:
Autumn Pumpkin Doll is a fabric doll with floppy arms and legs. She has an orange pumpkin head with a Jack O' Lantern face and is wearing a crown of vines. Her brown cotton dress has a swirl pattern and is accented with a primitive cotton apron. Her floppy legs have printed-on orange and black stockings and black boots with twine ties. In her arms, complete with wooden sticks for hands, she is carrying a burlap sack full of dried grass. The finishing touches are a craft paper name tag and jute twine attached to her upper back for hanging. Autumn truly adds a fun primitive twist to the fall season!
Measures 18" high by 6" wide.

Our Rosie Doll is a unique design by artist Joyce Napotnik. Her primitive canvas face has big brown eyes with a stitched mouth and nose. She's wearing a plaid dress and petticoats, and an apron with patches. Her look is finished off with a kerchief with a puff of black wool hair sticking out. Her floppy arms and legs have a worn look, as if she has been very loved by a child. She's got a craft paper tag attached with her name and she has a weighted bottom for stability.
Rosie measures 17" tall.

Our Ghost Pick is a stuffed fabric ghost that is attached to a wooden dowel. He is wearing a red felt scarf and has a drawn-on ghostly face with rosy cheeks. He has a safety pin at his top that is accented with a rusty jingle bell and a cheesecloth tie on the dowel. This adorable ghost is ready for Halloween!
Measures 16" high by 5" wide.

Holly Snowman Doll is a stuffed snowman who's ready for winter! She's wearing a black felt jacket that's accented with pearlescent buttons and a red hand warmer. Her red plaid pleated skirt matches the trim on her coat and her black felt hat. Her cross stitched mouth, stuffed carrot nose and button eyes complete this adorably primitive look.
A weighted bottom adds sitting stability. Holly measures 14" high by 5" wide.

This 4" H x 2.25" Dia. battery-operated pillar with a flame-shaped bulb that shines a warm yellow light is set in a glossy black textured sleeve.
Our timer pillars have two separate "on" functions. By switching the switch to the "1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching to the "2" position, the timer function is activated. This means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on for another 6 and off for 18, and so on. The time that you originally flip the switch to the "2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the time you wish for them to be set.
Uses 2 AA batteries (not included).

The Mustard Pebble Creek Half Sphere is an artificial floral that features deep yellow and gold bud flowers alongside pale green leaves. The flat base allows this floral to easily sit on a shelf, in a decorative bowl, or even as a lovely centerpiece. It measures 10" wide by 4" high.

The Mustard Pebble Creek Candle Ring is a combination of warm yellow and gold buds alongside pale green leaves and a matching ring base. With an inside diameter of 6" and an outside diameter of 10", it is the perfect accent for a slender vase or a pillar candle.

The Mustard Pebble Creek Candle Ring is a combination of warm yellow and gold buds alongside pale green leaves and a matching ring base. With an inside diameter of 3" and an outside diameter of 8", it is the perfect accent for a slender vase or a pillar candle.

The Mustard Pebble Creek Bush is an artificial bouquet of pale green plastic leaves and yellow/gold foam buds. This piece is perfect for accenting a decorative vase or pitcher. It measures 10" high by 5" wide.

column1: It's Your Time To Bloom Fabric Hanging ..
column4: The It's Your Time to Bloom Fabric Hanging is a small embroidered hanging sign that is made of cream fabric, a pink scalloped edge, and hung from a black wire hanger. The embroidery features colorful flowers and the phrase it's your time to bloom. This piece measures 9.5" high by 4" wide and was designed by Suzie Pienta.

The Baby Peggy Doll is a primitive doll that easily hangs for display from a string on its back. The black fabric doll features black yarn hair, white button eyes, and a small embroidered mouth. The baby doll is wearing a plaid onesie and a tan bib with matching headband. There are two small, rustic jingle bell accents on the bib. This doll was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 11" high by 3" wide and 1" deep.

The Merrily Holiday Doll is a primitive girl doll with straight red yarn hair, stitched facial features, a red and green plaid dress and a matching hair bow. A white apron is sewn around her waist with an embroidered mistletoe leaf on the bottom and a name tag reading Merrily was pinned to her collar. She is weighted to help in sitting on a shelf or in a chair and measures 18" high by 9" wide and 3" deep. This doll was designed by Joyce Napotnik.

The Country Sunshine Pillow is a minimalistic ivory throw pillow that features a lightly distressed grey cotton-pod illustration alongside the phrase raised on country sunshine. With the lightweight burlap texture of the fabric, this pillow is perfect for any modern farmhouse decor. It measures 10" square by 3.5" deep.

The Janel Doll is a primitive farm girl doll with embroidered facial features, yarn hair tied in a side ponytail, and primitive plush pigs in her arms. Her dress is a bold orange and brown patterned with ivory floral accents and her apron is a simple tan color. Pinned to her chest is a name tag that reads Janel. This doll was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 24" high by 7" wide and 2" deep.

The Grandpa Martin Doll is a primitive man doll that looks like the classic vintage grandpa. He has white cotton hair on the sides of his bald head, his eyebrows, and mustache. He wears a simple striped shirt, a thick fluffy scarf, and denim colored fabric pants. There are thin wire glasses on his face and a tag pinned to his scarf that reads Martin and he carries a yellowed newspaper. The Grandpa Martin doll is weighted so he can sit up on his own on a shelf or in a chair. This doll was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 16" high by 4.5" wide and 2" deep.
Shown with item number CS37633 Grandma Nellie Doll.

The Lori Doll is a primitive girl doll that is wearing a dark plaid dress, a straw hat, and black shoes with white laces. Under her arm is a stem of a beautiful artificial brown sunflower and she wears a tag pinned to her with her name printed on it. She is weighted so she can sit on her own on a shelf or chair. This doll was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 22" high by 7.5" wide and 3" deep.

column1: Enjoy The Little Things Resin Sign
column4: The Enjoy the Little Things Resin Sign is a small rectangular resin sign hung by a natural jute rope and engraved with the words Enjoy the little things. The sign is painted a cream color with the words a dark brown. It was designed by Suzie Pienta and measures 5.75" high by 4" wide.

column1: Today Is My New Favorite Day Resin Sign
column4: The Today is my New Favorite Day Resin Sign is a small rectangular resin sign hung by a natural jute rope and engraved with the words today is my new favorite day. The sign is painted a cream color with the words a dark brown. It was designed by Suzie Pienta and measures 5.75" high by 4" wide.

column1: Wake Up With A Purpose Resin Sign
column4: The Wake up with a Purpose Resin Sign is a small rectangular resin sign hung by a natural jute rope and engraved with the words always remember to fall asleep with a dream & wake up with a purpose. The sign is painted a cream color with the words a dark brown. It was designed by Suzie Pienta and measures 4" high by 5.75" wide.

The Grandma Nellie Doll is a primitive woman doll that looks like a classic vintage grandma. She is wearing black wire glasses, an off white dress with pink stars and a lighter pink collar, and has curly grey yarn hair. Pinned to her dress is a tag printed with the name Nellie, and she's carrying a ball of yarn with a a tapestry needle held in it. This doll was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 17" high by 5" wide and 2" deep.
Shown with item # CS37629 Grandpa Martin Doll and item # CS37680 Little Nellie Grandma Doll

This enameled metal ornament brings rustic, farmhouse flavor to your decorating around the home or in the kitchen. The silhouette of a cow outlined in black features the embossed words ‚ÄúFarm Fresh Milk,‚Äù and "Locally Grown," with hints of rust accenting the edges. A wire hanger is the finishing touch to this adorable ornament.
Our Farm Fresh Milk Enamel Ornament measures 6‚Äù high x 8 ¬º‚Äù wide.

This enameled metal ornament brings rustic, farmhouse flavor to your decorating around the home or in the kitchen. The silhouette of a pig outlined in black features the embossed words ‚Äúfarmers market,‚Äù and ‚Äúfresh organic,‚Äù with hints of rust accenting the edges. A wire hanger is the finishing touch to this adorable ornament.
Our Farmers Market Enamel Ornament measures 4 ¬æ‚Äù high x 8‚Äù wide.

The Rusty/Black Wall Bucket lets your customers add floral accents anywhere in their homes! The metal pail has a matte, rustic finish and the backside of the bucket is flat, with a keyhole hanger. It is 5-3/4" High by 7" Wide at rim, 4-1/2" deep.

The Little Nellie Grandma Doll is a small primitive doll that hangs from a string on its back and has the look of a classic vintage grandma. She has grey curly yarn hair, wears black wire glasses and a tan dress with a pink collar and star accents. This cute grandma doll was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 10" high by 5" wide and 1" deep.
Pictured with item # CS37633 Grandma Nellie Doll

The Black and Bronze Post Lantern is a battery powered, lightly distressed, black plastic lantern with frosted plastic sides. Inside is a flickering yellow bulb that gives the illusion of a real flame lantern without the worry of fire damage. This lantern was designed in house and measures 9.5" high by 4.25" wide and 4.25" deep.

The Black and Bronze Colonial Lantern is a battery powered, lightly distressed, black plastic lantern with frosted plastic sides. Inside is a flickering yellow bulb that gives the illusion of a real flame lantern without the worry of fire damage. This lantern was designed in house and measures 9.5" high by 5.5" wide and 5.5" deep.

This enameled metal ornament brings rustic, farmhouse flavor to your decorating around the home or in the kitchen. The silhouette of a hen outlined in black features the embossed words ‚Äúfresh organic eggs,‚Äù with hints of rust accenting the edges. A wire hanger is the finishing touch to this adorable ornament.
Our Fresh Eggs Enamel Ornament measures 8‚Äù high x 6 ¬æ‚Äù wide.

Similar to item #30661, but in black only.
This wooden rectangular tray has 1" rim and a slightly textured finish. Can be used as a way to display candles, decorative balls, or trinkets.
Measures 10.5" W x 6.5" H.
For Decorative Use Only

The Faith Awareness Doll is a beautiful primitive girl doll that reminds you to have faith in the search for a cure for Breast Cancer. This doll has brown yarn hair tied with bows and is wearing a pink floral dress with a rustic patch that is embroidered with the word Faith and two breast cancer ribbons. She carries a bouquet of pink artificial flowers and is weighted so she can sit up on her own. The sweet doll was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 18" high by 6" wide and 1.5" deep.

column1: Farmhouse Colors Mini Star Lantern, 3 asstd.
column4: The Mini Star Lanterns are now available in three farmhouse colors: Pewter (charcoal grey,) Stoneware (grey/beige,) and Soft White (ivory.) The lanterns feature a distressed metal frame with four star cut-outs. They each hold a primitive drip timer taper that will stay lit for 6 hours a day, shuts off for 18 and then repeats the cycle. To reset the cycle, simply turn off and then turn back on at desired time. These lanterns each measure 6" high by 3" wide and 3" deep.

column1: Farmhouse Colors Mini Railroad Lantern, 3 asstd.
column4: The Mini Railroad Lantern is now available in an assortment of three farmhouse colors: Pewter (charcoal grey), Stoneware (grey/beige,) and Soft White (ivory.) The battery-operated metal lantern has a cone-shaped top and punched out holes all over. A latch door opens to reveal one of our primitive drip timer tapers that's permanently affixed. Switch on and it stays lit for 6 hours and then goes off for 18 hours and then repeats the cycle. To reset the time, simply switch off and switch back on at desired time. They measure 6.25" high, 3" wide, and 3" deep.

column1: Farmhouse Colors Mini Colonial Lantern, 3 asstd.
column4: The Mini Colonial Lanterns are now available in three farmhouse colors: Pewter (charcoal grey,) Stoneware (grey/beige,) and Soft White (ivory.) They each hold a primitive drip timer taper that will stay lit for 6 hours a day, shuts off for 18 and then repeats the cycle. To reset the cycle, simply turn off and then turn back on at desired time. These lanterns each measure 7" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

column1: Live Like It's Spring Fabric Hanging ..
column4: The Live Like it's Spring Fabric Hanging is a small embroidered hanging sign that is made of cream fabric, a pink scalloped edge, and hung from a black wire hanger. The embroidery features colorful flowers and the live like its Spring. This piece measures 10.75" high by 5.5" wide and was designed by Suzie Pienta.

column1: Stop And Smell The Roses Resin Sign
column4: The Stop and Smell the Roses Resin Sign is a small rectangular resin sign hung by a natural jute rope and engraved with the words Stop & Smell the Roses. The sign is painted a cream color with the words a dark brown. It was designed by Suzie Pienta and measures 6.75" high by 3.5" wide.

The Nesting Cardinal is a primitive plush cardinal bird glued to a natural twig nest. This adorable piece is a perfect accent to any greenery in your home any time of year. It was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 2.5" high by 9" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Jingles Toy Company Bag Ornament is a tiny version of Santa's toy bag. The checked fabric bag is stuffed and sewn closed with a small mistletoe at the top that adds more holiday cheer to it. A thin string allows the bag to hang while a pinned tag reads Jingle's Toy Co. It was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 3" high by 2" wide and 1" deep.

The Americana Heart Ornaments are an assortment of two different designs that will show your American pride in a subtle way. Each design features the American flag image on a fabric heart base, one is printed vertically while the other is horizontal. They hang from a thin black hanger and measure 4" high by 2.5" wide.

The Abby Doll is a primitive girl doll with embroidered facial features and shoe laces, gold yarn hair braided in two side braids, and a name tag that reads Abby. She's wearing a brown felt dress over a yellow and red plaid shirt and a matching brown felt hat. This doll was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 23" high by 7" wide and 2" deep.

The David Fisherman Doll is a primitive man doll wearing a matching yellow felt wet jacket, pants, and hat. A fishing pole rests in his left arm with a natural jute rope holding fabric fish attached to the top. The doll also features button eyes, stitched nose and mouth, and a name tag pinned to his collar that reads David. This doll was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 18" high by 7" wide and 3" deep.

The Beth Doll is a primitive girl doll that is a lovely vintage-inspired accent. The doll has black button eyes, light brown yarn hair, and is wearing a brown checked dress. Pinned to its chest is a name tag that reads Beth. This doll was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 16" high by 6" wide and 1" deep.

The Boy and Girl Bunnies are an assortment of two primitive rabbit dolls that each carry a carrot and would nicely accent any Easter decor. The girl bunny wears a navy blue dress with rustic jingle bell accents, a plaid scarf, and a matching bow around one of her ears. The boy bunny wears blue pants that match her dress, jute rope suspenders, and a plaid scarf. His stomach is accented with rustic jingle bells. On his back is a string that allows him to hang for display or they could both easily be sat on a shelf due to their weighted bottoms. These bunnies were designed by Dawn Stake and measure 14" high by 4" wide and 1" deep.

The Antique Carrot is a foam carrot covered in orange dyed fabric that has been lightly distressed for an antique look. A piece of natural jute rope is tied around the middle to allow you to hang it or attach it to other decor pieces. At the top of the carrot are strands of straw tucked into the fabric for a natural look. This carrot was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 12" high by 2.5" wide and 0.5" deep.

column1: Peace, Joy, Believe Script Metal Ornament, 3 asst.
Farmhouse Ivory Clip on Candle w/remote..10/set

column4: The Sherpa Santa is a festive, primitive doll made to look like a vintage Santa Claus. This version of Santa is wearing a primitive outfit that is contrasted with a bright red scarf and hat that hangs down his side. The doll can either lean on something or hang from a small string on its back for display. It was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 16" high by 9.5" wide and 2" deep.

The Little Millie Doll is a small primitive girl doll that easily hangs from a string on its back. The vintage looking doll features red yarn hair, button eyes, and a red embroidered mouth. She's wearing a red plaid jumper dress with small tan button accents. This doll was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 10" high by 5" wide and 1" deep.

The Frosty Friends Welcome Snowman is a freestanding primitive snowman doll. The festive doll is comprised of a tan fabric body, a rustic black top hat, a green scarf with a rustic jingle bell, and embroidered facial features and words that read Frosty Friends Welcome. It was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 10" high by 7" wide and 1" deep.

The Stocking Cap Snowman Ornament is a primitive plush snowman head with a festive Santa hat with a jingle bell on the end and a matching red scarf. It is hung from a small string on the back side and has three-dimensional features. The ornament was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 6" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Christmas Cardinal Ornament is a primitive plush cardinal bird with a festive Christmas wreath around its neck and a string on its back for ease in display on a tree or on the wall. The bright red of the simple fabric bird contrasted with the twig wreath gives it a lovely Christmas look. It was designed by Kitty Johnson and measures 4" high by 8" wide and 1" deep.

The Grey Scarf Snowman Ornament is a primitive plush snowman head with a festive candy cane on its grey top hat and a matching grey scarf. It is hung from a small string on the back side and has three-dimensional features. The ornament was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 6" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Chilly Snowman ornament is a hanging plush snowman figure with stitched facial features, a fabric top hat and scarf, and a bundle of artificial winter florals. Pinned to his scarf is a name tag that reads Chilly. This adorable snowman would perfectly accent any winter decor. It was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 7" high by 4" wide and 2" deep.
Pictured with item number CS37636, Chilly Snowman Doll.

The Large Melting Snowman is a rustic, freestanding, plush decor item that is a cute reminder that though it's a cold winter night, it's warm and cozy inside. The snowman has three-dimensional features including its eyes, nose, and buttons. Its arms are made of twigs and sprout from either side of its weighted body. The slouching snowman measures 9" high by 7" wide and 7" deep.

column1: Snowman and Christmas Tree Felt Mat ..
column4: The Snowman and Christmas Tree Felt Mat is a fun way to add holiday cheer to your tables wether it's used as a centerpiece, stand scarf, or even as a placemat. The mat is made of a thick, black felt, and accented by a repeating pattern of ivory snowmen with red scarfs and bright green trees. In the center of the mat is an ivory snowflake. The edges of the mat are scalloped for an added design feature. This mat was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 12" in diameter.

The Chilly Snowman Doll is a freestanding plush snowman figure with stitched facial features, a fabric top hat and scarf, and a bundle of artificial winter florals. Pinned to his scarf is a name tag that reads Chilly. This adorable snowman would perfectly accent any winter decor. It was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 9.5" high by 4" wide and 3" deep.
Pictured with item number CS37699, Chilly Snowman Ornament.

The Candy Cane Snowman Stakes are an assortment of two different twig stakes that are each topped with a primitive plush snowman head. The first snowman is wearing a grey scarf and top hat with a festive candy cane attached. The second is wearing a red tinsel scarf and a twig crown. They were designed by Dawn Stake and each measure 11" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Stocking Cap Snowman Stakes are an assortment of two different twig stakes that are each topped with a plush snowman head. The first snowman head is wearing a red fabric scarf and a black top hat while the second is wearing a similar red scarf and red stocking hat. They were designed by Dawn Stake and measure 11" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Nativity Scene Lantern is a lightly distressed black plastic lantern with one of two glittery designs on each of the four sides and a strand of white lights inside. The first design simple features the script words Peace on Earth while the second is an illustration of a nativity scene. This lantern was designed in house and measures 9.5" high by 4.25" wide and 4.25" deep.
Requires 2 AA batteries (not included.)

column1: Top Hat Snowman w/ Tree on Plate ..
column4: This decorative plate is hung from a wire hanger and features a plush snowman glued to its wooden base. This piece is the perfect vintage-inspired Christmas decoration. It measures 11" high by 7" wide and 2" deep.

The Resin Carved Alpine Tree is a freestanding piece of resin, carved to look like a tree with dimensional markings to add depth to the branches. With its slightly curving trunk, the tree has more whimsy than others of its kind. This small tree measures 9" high by 2.25" wide and 2" deep.

The Witchy Pumpkin Stake is a wooden stake topped with a plush, painted jack-o-lantern head wearing a witch hat. This festive Halloween stake is accented by a straw bow and measures 20" high by 4" wide and 4" deep.

The Antique Sparkle Candy Cane is a foam cane wrapped in striped fabric with a flexible wire for easy maneuverability. The cane is the classic style of a candy cane and covered in glitter to give it a festive, wintery look. This 12" high candy cane is the perfect Christmas ornament for a tree or when added to a centerpiece.

The Antique Sparkle Candy Cane is a foam cane wrapped in striped fabric with a flexible wire for easy maneuverability. The cane is the classic style of a candy cane and covered in glitter to give it a festive, wintery look. This 9" high candy cane is the perfect Christmas ornament for a tree or when added to a centerpiece.

The Mini Brynlee Doll is a small primitive girl doll with a modern color scheme. The doll has auburn yarn hair held by small clips, button eyes, and a small red embroidered mouth. She is wearing a brown and white polkadot dress, a grey scarf, grey pants, and she is carrying a muted colored sunflower. This doll is weighted to sit on her own and measures 15" high by 4.5" wide and 1" deep.

column1: Top Hat Snowman w/ Wreath on Plate ....
column4: This decorative wooden plate is hung from a thin metal wire and features a plush snowman holding a winter wreath glued to its base. This piece would add a fun vintage look to any winter decor. It measures 11" high by 7" wide and 2" deep.

column1: Top Hat Snowman w/ Wreath on Plate ....
column4: This decorative wooden plate is hung from a thin metal wire and features a vintage-inspired plush snowman holding a small twig wreath glued to its base. This piece is the perfect accent for any rustic winter decor. It measures 11" high by 7" wide and 2" deep.

The Charlie Snowman Doll is a vintage looking plush snowman that is the perfect piece to welcome your friends to your home during the holiday season. The snowman is wearing a matching knit hat and scarf with a striped pattern and is carrying on its twig arm a lightly distressed wood sign on a metal wire that reads Welcome Friends next to illustrations of a star and a stocking. Pinned to the scarf is a name tag that reads Charlie. This adorable snowman was designed by Joyce Napotnik and measures 10.5" high by 7" wide and 7" deep.

The Candy Cane Stick Ornaments are a set of four identical foam sticks wrapped in red and off white fabric then covered in glitter for a festive Christmas look. The vintage inspired ornaments are hung from plastic hangers and measure 3.5' high by 0.25" wide.

The Cozy Scarf Snowman Stake is a twig stake that is topped by a rustic, plush snowman. The snowman is an off white color with two black buttons on its stomach and a red fabric scarf around its neck. The snowman also has dimensional facial features and a twig crown on its head. This snowman stake was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 14" high by 2" wide and 2" deep.

The Cold Hands Warm Heart Snowman is a freestanding primitive snowman doll. The festive doll is comprised of a tan fabric body, a rustic black top hat, a red scarf with a rustic jingle bell, and embroidered facial features and words that read Cold Hands Warm Heart. It was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 10" high by 7" wide and 1" deep.

The Santa Tree Topper is a primitive Santa doll attached to a metal spring used to hold it on to the very top of a tree. This Santa figure has embroidered facial features, a yarn beard, a long red fabric hat and coat, and is carrying a decorated Christmas wreath. This topper was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 16" high by 5" wide and 5.5" deep.

The Resin Carved Alpine Tree is a freestanding piece of resin, carved to look like a tree with dimensional markings to add depth to the branches. With its slightly curving trunk, the tree has more whimsy than others of its kind. This small tree measures 12" high by 2.75" wide and 2" deep.

column1: Vintage White US Mail Post Box
column4: The Vintage White US Mail Post Box is a metal hanging box with embossed letters and details that have all been painted white and distressed for a vintage look. The words read "letters" and "post." On the hinged lid is a slot for letters and a hole at the top allows it to easily hang on a nail. The post box measures 16.25" high by 11.5" wide and 5" deep.

The Old Town Market Black Pitcher is an embossed metal pitcher that has been painted black and lightly distressed for an antique look. The dimensional letters read "OLD TOWN MARKET" above a grain design. The pitcher measures 7.75" high by 7.5" wide and 7.5" deep.

The Distressed Black Candle Holder is a thin, vintage inspired candlestick holder. The metal piece has been painted black and distressed to lend it a rustic feel. The candle holder measures 14.5" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

The Distressed Black Candle Holder is a thin, vintage inspired candlestick holder. The metal piece has been painted black and distressed to lend it a rustic feel. The candle holder measures 9" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

The Distressed Black Candle Holder is a thin, vintage inspired candlestick holder. The metal piece has been painted black and distressed to lend it a rustic feel. The candle holder measures 11.75" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

The Metal Rooster Watering Can is a metal pitcher that has been painted and styled to look like a rooster. The distressed watering can is held by a matching vintage style wire hanger with a wooden handle and is the perfect farmhouse garden accessory. It measures 10" high by 12" wide and 6" deep.

column1: Green Valley Sunflower Seeds Watering Can ..
column4: The Green Valley Sunflower Seeds Watering Can is a metal can with an untreated handle and spout. The body of the can is printed with the labels of a vintage seed packet. It measures 5.5" high by 13.25" wide and 3.5" deep.

The Locally Grown Green Milk Can is a metal can that has been embossed and painted green then lightly distressed for a vintage look. The embossed letters read "100% quality Locally Grown Fresh Produce." It measures 11.5" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

column1: When In Doubt Add Flowers Fabric Hanging ..
column4: The When in Doubt Add Flowers is an embroidered hanging sign that is made of mustard colored fabric, an ivory scalloped edge, and hung from a dowel rod and a jute rope. The embroidery features a colorful floral wreath surrounding the script phrase "When in doubt add flowers." It measures 10.5" high by 6.25" wide and was designed by Suzie Pienta.

The Top Hat Snowman Ornament is a primitive plush snowman head with a red scarf and a grey top hat. It is hung from a small string on the back side and has three-dimensional features. The ornament was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 5" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Cozy Scarf Snowman Ornament is a primitive plush snowman with a red scarf and a twig halo. It is hung from a small string on the back side and has three-dimensional features that include jingle bells on its stomach and a wooden carrot nose. The ornament was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 5.5" high by 2.5" wide and 2.5" deep.

The Distressed White Candle Holder is a thin, vintage inspired candlestick holder. The metal piece has been painted white and distressed to lend it a rustic feel. The candle holder measures 9" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

The Embossed Bread Box is a metal breadbox that has been painted white with black trim and grey quatrefoils on the lid. The embossed letters read "FRESH BREAD," "BAKED FRESH," and "SERVED DAILY." The hinged lid allows for this to not only be a darling decor piece, but also an actually functioning container in your kitchen. It measures 10" high by 13.5" wide and 11.5" deep.

The Distressed White Metal Birdcage is a metal cage that has been painted white and distressed for an antique look. This cage opens from the top and is closed with a swing arm hook latch. There is a decorative finial on the top with a metal hanging look attached. The birdcage measures 14.5" high by 9.5" wide and 9.5" deep.
The Vintage Blue Floral Metal Bucket is a galvanized metal bucket wrapped in a sky blue label with illustrations of pastel florals. This bucket measures 4.25" high by 5" wide and 5" deep.

The Rustic White Timer Taper is a battery operated artificial candle with a wax coating that has been painted to look weathered. This candlestick measures 4" high and requires one AA battery (not included). It includes a timer function that allows it to stay on for 6 hours then turn itself off for 18 hours.

The Distressed Beaded Believe Wall Sign is an oval-shaped, cutout, wooden sign that features a dimensional beaded border and a jute rope hanger. The wood has been painted white and distressed for a weathered look and the script word inside the oval ring reads "Believe." The sign measures 9" high by 13" wide and 0.75" deep.

The Vintage Blue Basketweave Milk Can is a galvanized metal can with two side handles and a basketweave texture. The can has been painted blue, distressed, and lightly rusted to give it a vintage look. It measures 14" high by 7.75" wide and 7.75" deep.

The Distressed White Candle Holder is a thin, vintage inspired candlestick holder. The metal piece has been painted white and distressed to lend it a rustic feel. The candle holder measures 14.5" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

The Distressed White Candle Holder is a thin, vintage inspired candlestick holder. The metal piece has been painted white and distressed to lend it a rustic feel. The candle holder measures 11.75" high by 4.75" wide and 4.75" deep.

The Architectural Arch Wall Planter is an assortment of two arched wooden window frames that have been painted white with either blue or pink borders and have a galvanized metal cup attached to them. The framed have been distressed for an antique feel and are easily hung from a sawtooth hanger on the back. They each measure 16.75" high by 8.25" wide and 3.5" deep.

The Distressed Beaded Welcome Wall Sign is an oval-shaped, cutout, wooden sign that features a dimensional beaded border and jute rope hanger. The wood has been painted white and distressed for a weathered look and the script word inside the oval ring reads "Welcome." The sign measures 9" high by 13" wide and 0.75" deep.

The Rustic White Timer Taper is a battery operated artificial candle with a wax coating that has been painted to look weathered. This candlestick measures 9" high and requires three AA batteries (not included). It includes a timer function that allows it to stay on for 6 hours then turn itself off for 18 hours.

The Rustic White Pillar Candle is a battery operated artificial candle with a wax coating that has been painted to look weathered. This pillar measures 4" high and 2.5‚Äù wide and requires two AA batteries (not included). It includes a timer function that allows it to stay on for 6 hours then turn itself off for 18 hours.

The Rustic White Pillar Candle is a battery operated artificial candle with a wax coating that has been painted to look more weathered. This pillar measures 3.5" high and 2.5‚Äù wide and requires two AA batteries (not included). It includes a timer function that allows it to stay on for 6 hours then turn itself off for 18 hours.

The Rustic White Pillar Candle is a battery operated artificial candle with a wax coating that has been painted to look weathered. This pillar measures 4" high and 2.5‚Äù wide and requires two AA batteries (not included). It includes a timer function that allows it to stay on for 6 hours then turn itself off for 18 hours.

The Vintage Flower Market Cart is a metal wheel barrow with embossed words on the side that read "FLOWER MARKET." The handles, legs, and wheels have been painted glossy black while the bucket has been painted white and distressed for a rustic finish. This piece measures 10" high by 15" wide and 6" deep, allowing it double as a decorative indoor planter.

The Distressed Black Pig Planter is a metal pig that has an open back as the container. This planter has been painted black and lightly distressed for an antique look. It measures 12.25" high by 13.75" wide and 5.5" deep.

The Warm Light White Pillar is a white frosted plastic candle with a silicon-dipped flame. This candle gently flickers when the required three AAA batteries (not included) are in place. It measures 4" high by 3" wide and is available in multiple sizes (See 84752, 84754, and 84755 for others.)

The Warm Light White Pillar is a white frosted plastic candle with a silicon-dipped flame. This candle gently flickers when the required three AAA batteries (not included) are in place. It measures 3" high by 3" wide and is available in multiple sizes (See 84753, 84754, and 84755 for others.)

The Warm Light White Pillar is a white frosted plastic candle with a silicon-dipped flame. This candle gently flickers when the required three AAA batteries (not included) are in place. It measures 6" high by 3" wide and is available in multiple sizes (See 84752, 84753, and 84754 for others.)

The Warm Light White Pillar is a white frosted plastic candle with a silicon-dipped flame. This candle gently flickers when the required three AAA batteries (not included) are in place. It measures 4" high by 3" wide and is available in multiple sizes (See 84752, 84753, and 84755 for others.)

The Grey Resin Bunny is an assortment of four grey resin bunny rabbits in different positions. These lightweight bunnies make great accents for a garden or a shelf in the Spring. The largest measures 3.5" high by 2" wide and 2" deep; the second largest measures 2" wide by 3" high and 3" deep; and the smaller two measure 2" wide by 2.5" high and 3" deep.

The Kind Word Fabric Hanging is a red fabric rectangle held by a white wooden dowel rod tied with a natural jute rope. The white script phrase on the fabric reads "A kind word is like a Spring day" and matches the white fringe border at the bottom. It measures 8.5" high by 4.25" wide.

column1: Bloom Where You Are Planted Fabric Hanging ..
column4: The Bloom Where You are Planted Fabric Hanging is a teal fabric rectangle with a wood panel accent at the top and a white pom pom fringe at the bottom. The modern white text on the fabric reads "Bloom where you are planted." It measures 27.5" high by 18.5" wide and is hung from a jute rope attached at the top.

The Bless My Blooms Fabric Hanging is a beige fabric rectangle with two loops that hang on a black dowel rod. The modern black lettering printed on the fabric reads "bless my blooms." This piece measures 13.5" high by 7.25" wide and 0.25" deep and hangs from a black string.

The Architectural Arch Wall Vase is an assortment of two wooden arch window frame that has been painted white with either blue or pink showing through beneath where it has been distressed for an antique look. A glass vase is held to the wooden frame with a galvanized metal casing and a sawtooth hanger on the back allows for easy display. They each measure 10.5" high by 5.25" wide and 2.75" deep.

The Vintage Bunny Metal Can is a galvanized metal cup wrapped in a glossy ivory label. The label is printed with watercolored bunnies, watering cans, and strawberries, making this can the perfect Spring accent. It measures 4" high by 3.25" in diameter.

The Flower Market Metal Basket is a rectangular metal container that has been shaped with a basketweave texture, painted blue, and finished with light distressing and rusted details for an antique look. The embossed letters on the basket read "FLOWER MARKET - SEEDS & SUPPLIES" beneath two pre-drilled holes for wall display. It measures 8.5" high by 12.5" wide and 4.25" deep.

The Country Road Market Black Bucket is an embossed metal bucket that has been painted black and lightly distressed for an antique look. the dimensional letters read "COUNTRY ROAD MARKET EST 1926 HOMEMADE PRODUCTS & LOCAL PRODUCE" framed by a grain design. The top and bottom of the bucket also feature a matching grain design. This piece measures 8.75" high by 8.5" wide and 8.5" deep.

The Distressed Galvanized Bistro Trash Bin is a galvanized metal container that has been embossed with an illustration of a Rooster along with the phrase "Le Coq en Pate." The hinged lid is opened by an attached foot pedal that has been distressed to match the rest of the bin. It measures 14" high by 10.25" wide and 10.25" deep.

The White Enamel Cheers Sitter is a cutout wooden sign that reads "Cheers" in a script font. The front of the sign is accented with white enamel. The free-standing sign measures 5.5" high by 11.5" wide and 1" deep.

The Rustic White Timer Taper is a battery operated artificial candle with a wax coating that has been painted to look weathered. This candlestick measures 6" high and requires two AA batteries (not included). It includes a timer function that allows it to stay on for 6 hours then turn itself off for 18 hours.

column1: There Are Always Flowers Fabric Hanging ..
column4: The There are Always Flowers Fabric Hanging is a cream-colored fabric rectangle with three loops attached that hang from a black wooden dowel rod. The bold black lettering printed on the fabric reads "there are always flowers for those who want to see them." It measures 32" high by 16" wide and 0.5" deep and hangs from a black string tied to the dowel rod.

column1: Every Bunny Welcome Easter Wood Sign ..
column4: The Every Bunny Welcome Easter Wood Sign is a rectangular slat wooden wall sign that has been painted white with a grey border. The sign hangs from two d-rings on the back and features cutout metal words that read" Happy Easter EVERY BUNNY WELCOME" along with two rabbit silhouettes. It measures 8.5" high by 15.75" wide and 1" deep.

column1: Vintage Blue Metal Basketweave Post Box w/ Hooks ..
column4: The Vintage Blue Metal Basketweave Post Box with Hooks is a fully functional, embossed metal post box that has been painted light blue and distressed for a vintage look. This postbox hangs from two keyhole slots on the back and has two hangers at the bottom allowing you to store your daily mail and keys in the same location. The word "POST" is embossed on the hinged lid beneath a matching filigree. It measures 16.75" high by 10.5‚Äù wide by 4.75‚Äù deep.

The Distressed Wood Bunny on Post is a thin wood board cut into the shape of a running rabbit and attached to a small wooden pedestal by a metal post. The rabbit shape has been painted white and distressed for a rustic aesthetic, making it the perfect accent for any farmhouse Spring decor. It easily stands on its own and measures 9.5" high by 10.25" wide and 2.25" deep at the base.

The Distressed Wood Bunny Planter is a wooden container with a cutout rabbit shape on the front and back. Each side has been painted white distressed for a weathered look. It measures 11" high by 9.5" wide and 5.5" deep.

The Distressed Bunny Dish is a shallow metal dish with four round posts for feet, attached metal tail and ears, and painted facial features. The entire dish has been painted white with rust detailing for an antique look. This piece is perfect for displaying Easter sweets in the Spring. It measures 6" high by 10.5" wide and 6.75" deep.

The Vintage Bunny Wood Ornament is a thin wooden board cut into the shape of a rabbit and painted with bright pastel watercolors that are perfect for Spring. The ornament comes fitted with a predrilled hole and jute rope for easy display. It measures 6" high by 5" wide and 0.25" deep.

column1: Live Life In Full Bloom Fabric Hanging ..
column4: The Live Life in Full Bloom Fabric Hanging is a mustard yellow fabric rectangle attached to a wood slat top that hangs from a natural jute rope. The modern white lettering printed on the fabric reads "Life life in full bloom." It measures 11.5" high by 7" wide.

Our black metal taper holder has an old-style colonial look with a slightly speckled finish and can accommodate any of our battery-operated taper candles.
Measures 5-3/4" W x 3" H.

The sign is accented with an embossed metal bird and a bird's nest garnished in ferns. Includes two hooks on the back for easy hanging. Hang in the entryway or kitchen for some added greenery in the springtime or all year round.
column9: Measuring 8" x 24", this whitewashed wood slat sign features the word "HOME" in metal cut-out lettering.

column4: Black Wooden Bowl is a decorative wood bowl with a distressed, black painted finish. Display potpourri in this simple country-style bowl, or display in a foyer to collect pocket change. Measures 5.5"in diameter by 1.75" deep.

column4: Black Oval Tray is a decorative wood tray with a rustic black finish. Use for organization in any room of the home for a primitive touch. Measures 1.5" high by 15.5" wide and 5.5" deep.

column1: Simple Life, Good Life Block, 2 asst...
column4: The Simple Life Good Life Blocks are an assortment of two block designs. Each block features a whitewashed wooden frame with brass accents that surrounds a galvanized metal square. The metal is covered with a textured charcoal grey paint and printed with either the phrase Simple life. Good life. or Live like someone left the gate open below an illustration of a cotton pod. The blocks can either sit on their own or hang from a sawtooth hanger. They each measure 4" square by 0.5" deep.

column4: The Ohio T-shirt is a heather graphite colored cotton-blend crewneck t-shirt that has been printed with a black outline of the state of Ohio and a matching script "Ohio" inside of it. This shirt is available in five unisex sizes (see L22S, L22L, L22XL, and L22XXL for more.) It was designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: Nothing But Happiness Fabric Wall Hanging†
column4:
Sooth your soul and welcome only happiness into your home with the Nothing but Happiness Fabric Wall Hanging. With a modern white fabric and a natural wooden dowel rod and jute rope, this banner is the perfect farmhouse accessory. In the center of the banner in a black serif font is the inspirational, rhyming phrase "May your troubles be less & your blessings be more & nothing but happiness come through your door." It measures 19.25" high by 18.75" wide and 1.25"deep.
Material: Fabric, Wood, and Jute
Reads: "May your troubles be less & your blessing be more & nothing but happiness come through your door."
Measures: 19.25" H x 18.75" W x 1.25" Dp.

The Ohio T-shirt is a heather graphite colored cotton-blend crewneck t-shirt that has been printed with a black outline of the state of Ohio and a matching script "Ohio" inside of it. This shirt is available in five unisex sizes (see L22M, L22L, L22XL, and L22XXL for more.) It was designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: Let Love Grow Engraved Sign, Berrylicious, 18" x 3.5"
column4: The Let Love Grow Engraved Sign is a rectangular wood block that has been painted red and lightly distressed for a weathered look. The engraved lettering reads "let love grow." and measures 3.5" high by 18" wide. This sign has two keyhole slots on the back for wall display and was made in the USA.

column1: Mountain Pine Wreath w/ Red Berries, 18"
column4: The Mountain Pine w/ Berries Wreath is an artificial winter greenery that is comprised of heavily glittered red foam berries, mini pinecones, and green plastic branches on a twig wreath base. It measures 10" inside and 20" outside diameter and can easily hang on the wall to accent any Christmas decor.

The Love Paws Tote is a lightweight and durable canvas bag with grey, beige, and black blocked colors and beige shoulder straps. It reads "LOVE" in bold black lettering with a paw print in place of the 'O'. It measures 14" wide by 16" high and the straps measure 11.5" high by 1" wide.

The Terracotta Blessed T-shirt is a soft cotton-blend t-shirt that is printed with a bold white font that reads "Blessed." This shirt is available in five unisex sizes (see L21S, L21L, L21XL, and L21XXL for more.) It was designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: Believe, XX Large - Light Heather Gray
column4: The Light Grey Believe T-Shirt is a heather grey cotton-blend crewneck t-shirt. The modern black print reads "IT'S BETTER WHEN YOU Believe." This shirt is available in five unisex sizes (see L27S, L27M, L27L, and L27XL for more.) It was designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: Find Joy In The Ordinary Jute Wrapped Sign
column4: The Find Joy in the Ordinary Jute Wrapped Sign is a wooden sign that has been painted white and distressed for a weathered look. This sign features an illustration of green leaves on a branch, a jute rope tied around the top, and a black printed phrase that reads "Find Joy in the ordinary." It can easily sit on its own through use of an easel on its back or hang from its jute hanger. The sign measures 11.5" high by 7.75" wide and 0.5" deep.

column1: Make Your Soul Happy Jute Wrapped Sign
column4: The Make Your Soul Happy Jute Wrapped Sign is a wooden sign that has been painted white and distressed for a weathered look. This sign features an illustration of pink flowers, a jute rope tied around the top, and a black printed phrase that reads "Take time to make your soul happy" It can easily sit on its own through use of an easel on its back or hang from the jute hanger. The sign measures 11.5" high by 7.75" wide and 0.5" deep.

column1: Bless This Nest Floral Wood Sitter
column4: The Bless Our Nest Floral Wood Sitter is a birdhouse-shaped white shadowbox sign with a deep brown frame. The grey script lettering read "bless our nest" above artificial florals that have been glued to the frame. These florals include a pink peony flower and green rounded leaves, making this the perfect piece for Spring and Summer. This sitter measures 9.5" high by 6.25" wide and 1.75" deep.

The Bloom Flower Pot Wall Hanging is a rectangular wooden sign that features metal cutout lettering and a small half flower pot with an artificial succulent inside. It reads "bloom" in a bold black script font and measures 9" high by 18.5" wide and 1.5" deep.

column1: Be Still & Know XX Large- Heather Navy
column4: The Be Still & Know T-shirt is a heather blue t-shirt made with super soft cotton-blend fabric that is comfortable and easy to pair with your favorite jeans. It reads, "be still & know" in white lettering on the left chest area. This t-shirt is available in five unisex sizes (See L23S, L23M, L23L, and L23XL for more.) These shirts were designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: Holly Jolly AF, Small - Heather Red
column4: The Holly Jolly AF T-shirt is a red, super soft cotton-blend t-shirt that is sure to receive compliments during the holidays. It makes a great gift and has a unisex fit and design. It reads, "Holly Jolly AF" is written in white script lettering and is printed and designed in Ohio. Available in five sizes (See L26M, L26L, L26XL, and L26XXL for others.)

column1: Holly Jolly AF, Medium- Heather Red
column4: The Holly Jolly AF T-shirt is a red, super soft cotton-blend t-shirt that is sure to receive compliments during the holidays. It makes a great gift and has a unisex fit and design. It reads, "Holly Jolly AF" is written in white script lettering and is printed and designed in Ohio. Available in five sizes (See L26S, L26L, L26XL, and L26XXL for others.)

column1: Green Valley Sunflower Seeds Metal Can ..
column4: The Green Valley Sunflower Seeds Metal Can is a galvanized metal can that has been wrapped in a vintage inspired paper label. The design on the label is meant to look like a vintage sunflower seed packet and features illustrations of sunflowers and yellow lettering that reads "Green Valley Seed Company" and "SUNFLOWER SEEDS." It measures 4" high by 3.25" in diameter.

column1: Little Full Lotta Sap, X Large - Heather green
column4: The Little Full Lotta Sap T-shirt is a festive heather green cotton blend t-shirt that features a subtle reference to the classic holiday movie National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. The graphic tee depicts an illustration of a pine tree beneath bold white letters that read the quote "LITTLE FULL, LOTTA SAP." It is available in five unisex sizes (see L29S, L29M, L29L, and L29XXL for more) and was designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: To Plant A Garden Is To Believe Engraved Block, 8"
column4: The To Plant a Garden is to Believe Engraved Block is a carved rectangular wooden block that has been painted teal blue and sanded down on the edges for a weathered look. The engraved script words read "TO PLANT A GARDEN IS TO believe in tomorrow." This block easily sits on its own or as a stack with others like it (see 1013, 1006, 1010, 1008, 1012 for more.) It measures 1.75" high by 8" wide and was made in the USA.

The Friends are Flowers Engraved Block is a carved rectangular wooden block that has been painted yellow and sanded down on the edges for a weathered look. The engraved words read "friends are flowers in the garden of life" This block easily sits on its own or as a stack with others like it (see 1009, 1006, 1010, 1013, 1012 for more.) It measures 1.75" high by 8" wide and was made in the USA.

The Lavender Heather Spray is an artificial floral that features lavender-colored plastic buds on flexible wire stems that have been wrapped in green paper with green foam leaves for a more realistic aesthetic. This spray is available in four colors (see 15005, 15006, and 15008 for more) and measures 20" high by 6" wide and 2" deep.

The White Heather Spray is an artificial floral that features white plastic buds on flexible wire stems that have been wrapped in green paper with green foam leaves for a more realistic aesthetic. This spray is available in four colors (see 15005, 15007, and 15008 for more) and measures 20" high by 6" wide and 2" deep.

The Blush Heather Spray is an artificial floral that features plastic pink buds on flexible wire stems that have been wrapped in green paper with green foam leaves for a more realistic aesthetic. This spray is available in four colors (see 15006, 15007, and 15008 for more) and measures 20" high by 6" wide and 2" deep.
The Peony Stem, Blush is an artificial flower that features blush pink petals and dark green leaves on a long, flexible green stem. It measures 11" high by 3.5" wide and 3.5" deep.

The Pompom Stem, Blush is an artificial flower that features blush pink petals on a long, flexible green stem. It is available in two colors, (see item 15000 for white) and measures 11"high by 2" wide and 2"deep.

The Pink Hydrangea Pick is an artificial floral bouquet that features pink, ivory, and mauve fabric petals attached to a brown plastic branches. A large green plastic leaf sits alongside the bundle of flowers on a green plastic stem. It measures 12" high by 6" wide and 6" deep.

The Terracotta Blessed T-shirt is a soft cotton-blend t-shirt that is printed with a bold white font that reads "Blessed." This shirt is available in five unisex sizes (see L21S, L21M, L21L, and L21XL for more.) It was designed and printed in Ohio.

The Naughty but Nice T-shirt is a festive heather red cotton blend t-shirt that features a spin off phrase from the classic Christmas list. The bold white lettering reads "NAUGHTY But NICE" and is framed by two small snowflake illustrations giving this shirt the perfect bit of wintery charm. This shirt is available in four women's sizes (see L01S, L01M, and L01XL for more) and was designed and printed in Ohio, USA.

column1: Happy Easter Spring Floral Box Sign
column4: The Happy Easter Spring Floral Box Sign is a wooden box sign with a print attached to the front that looks like grey wood slats. The print features a watercolor illustration of a tan rabbit with a purple and pink floral crown. The rabbit is siting in a nest with speckled eggs and surrounded by purple and pink tulip flowers. White lettering across the top reads "Happy Easter." It measures 8" high by 8" wide and 1.75" deep.

column1: Honey For Sale Metal Wall Sign
column4: The Honey for Sale Metal Wall Sign is an embossed metal sign that has been painted white with black trim. The design features a full color illustration of a honey bee surrounded by the modern black lettering that reads "HONEY for SALE" and two black filigrees. It measures 19.5" high by 11.75" wide.

column1: Busy Bee Garden Company Wood Wall Sign
column4: The Busy Bee Garden Company Wood Wall Sign is is a white wooden board surrounded by an unfinished wood frame and printed with a vintage advertisement inspired design. The print is an illustration of a honey bee surrounded by bold black lettering that reads "The BUSY BEE" - "SEEDS" - "STEMS" - "BLOOMS" - "HONEY" and "GARDEN COMPANY." It measures 18.75" high by 13.75 wide and 1.5" deep and hangs from two sawtooth hangers on the back.

The Light Grey Believe T-Shirt is a heather grey cotton-blend crewneck t-shirt. The modern black print reads "IT'S BETTER WHEN YOU Believe." This shirt is available in five unisex sizes (see L27S, L27L, L27XL, and L27XXL for more.) It was designed and printed in Ohio.

column1: Where Flowers Bloom Wood Cutout Sign
column4: The Where Flowers Bloom Wood Cutout Sign is a rectangular wooden board with another wooden board attached to it. The top wood board has been painted beige and distressed for a weathered look while the bottom board was painted bright red. The top board has been printed with black lettering that reads "where flowers BLOOM so does" above the cutout word "hope" that allows the red to show through. The sign measures 23" high by 17.5" wide
The Family Script Metal Ornament is a twisted metal wire that spells out the word "Family" in script lettering. This ornament hangs from a flexible wire hanger and measures 4.75" high by 7" wide.

column1: Inspire, Imagine, Dream Script Metal Ornament, 3/set
column4: The Inspire, Imagine, Dream Metal Ornament is a set of three encouraging script words that have been formed from a silver-colored metal wire. The ornaments read either "inspire," "imagine," or "dream" and they hang from a thinner, more flexible metal wire.

The Mauve Hydrangea Pick is an artificial floral bouquet that features mauve, ivory, and mustard yellow fabric petals attached to a brown plastic branches. A large green plastic leaf sits alongside the bundle of flowers on a green plastic stem. It measures 12" high by 6" wide and 6" deep.

The Ivory Hydrangea Pick is an artificial floral bouquet that features ivory fabric petals attached to a brown plastic branches. A large green plastic leaf sits alongside the bundle of flowers on a green plastic stem. It measures 12" high by 6" wide and 6" deep.

The Succulent Bush - Green Buds is an artificial floral accent consisting of flexible green leaves and small green blooms. The bottom of the wires are wrapped together in brown paper to lend it a more natural look. This piece measures 12" high by 6.5" wide and 6.5" deep.

The Succulent Bush - Coral Buds is an artificial floral accent consisting of flexible green leaves and small coral-colored blooms. The bottom of the wires are wrapped together in brown paper to lend it a more natural look. This piece measures 12" high by 6.5" wide and 6.5" deep.

column1: Bee Humble and Kind Metal Sign
column4: The Bee Humble and Kind Metal Sign is an embossed metal sign that has been painted white and features an illustration of a honey bee above the script lettering that reads "humble & kind." The third ornament is in the shape of a star that has been painted red and features the cutout word "JOY" with measurements of 4" in diameter. These ornaments were designed by Suzie Pienta.
Material: Wood and wire
Designer: Suzie Pienta
Reads:
"PEACE"
"noel"
"JOY"
Dimensions:
Tree: 3.5" H. x 5" W.
Snowflake: 4.5" Dia.
Star: 4" Dia.

The Santa Believe Ornament is a wooden Santa head complete with the bright red hat and bush white beard. Cutout lettering in his beard reads "believe" in a script font. The ornament hangs from a black string hanger and measures 4.5" high by 3.75" wide and 0.25" deep.
Material: Wood and thread
Designer: Suzie Pienta
Reads: "believe"
Dimensions: 4.5" H. x 3.75" W. x 0.25" Dp.

The Country Cabin Wreath Ornament is a small, thin artificial wreath that hangs from a jute string. Two white, rustic wooden arrows are glued to the front and read in black lettering "country" and "cabin." A small red buffalo check ribbon is tied to the side of the wreath. It was designed by Dawn Stake and measures 2.75" in diameter.
Material: Artificial greenery & jute rope
Designer: Dawn Stake
Reads:
"country"
"cabin"
Dimensions: 2.75" Dia.

The Primitive Snowman Ornament is a styrofoam ball that has been covered in glitter and has a snowman face that includes black eyes and mouth and pointed nose. A red buffalo check fabric ribbon is tied on top of the snowman head that covers a bit of the black wire hanger. It measures 3" high by 1.5" in diameter.
Material: Styrofoam and wire
Designer: Dawn Stake
Dimensions: 3" H x 1.5" Dia

column1: Dear Santa Heart Tag Ornament - Set Of 4
column4:
The Dear Santa Heart Tag Ornaments are a set of 4 rectangular wooden ornaments that have been painted white and distressed for a rustic look contrasted by the modern black lettering and a red buffalo check heart. The first ornament reads " Dear Santa We have cookies." The second ornament reads " This house believes in Santa." The third ornament reads "You had me at HO HO HO!" The fourth ornament reads "You are the MERRY in my CHRISTMAS." Each ornament hangs from a thin jute string and measures 3.5" high by 2.25" wide and 0.25" deep.
Materials: Wood and jute
Designer: Pat Isaac
Reads:
"Dear Santa We have cookies"
"This house believes in Santa"
"You had me at HO HO HO!"
"You are the MERRY in my CHRISTMAS"
Dimensions: 3.5" H. x 2.25" W. x 0.25" Dp.

column1: Friends Heart Tag Ornaments - Set Of 4
column4:
The Friends Heart Tag Ornaments are a set of 4 rectangular wooden ornaments that have been painted white and distressed for a rustic look contrasted by the modern black lettering and a red buffalo check heart. The first ornament reads "Some of my best friends are flakes." The second ornament reads "Have a Merry Little Christmas." The third ornament reads "Friends make life Merrier." The fourth ornament reads "Meet me under the mistletoe!" Each ornament hangs from a thin jute string and measure 3.5" high by 2.25" wide and 0.25" deep.

Materials: Wood and jute
Designer: Pat Isaac
Reads:
"Some of my best friends are flakes"
"Have a Merry Little Christmas"
"Friends make life Merrier"
"Meet me under the mistletoe!"
Dimensions: 3.5" H. x 2.25" W. x 0.25" Dp.

The Merry Christmas Bulb is an assortment of three round wooden ornaments that each feature a dimensional snowflake at the top. Each ornament is printed with a three section design with the top and bottom sections featuring either red or white buffalo check. The center of the red buffalo check designs show a distressed shiplap design while the center of the white buffalo check design is solid red. On the white buffalo check design, white lettering reads "YOU ARE THE Merry IN MY Christmas." On the first of the red buffalo check designs is black lettering that reads "Merry Christmas" and the black lettering on the second reads "Believe IN THE MAGIC OF Christmas." The ornaments each hang from a red ribbon with a bow attached and measure 10.5" high by 6" wide and 0.75" deep.
Materials: Wood and ribbon
Designer: Pat Isaac
Reads:
"YOU ARE THE Merry IN MY Christmas"
"Merry Christmas"
"Believe IN THE MAGIC OF Christmas"
Dimensions: 10.5" H. x 6" W. x 0.75" Dp.

The Merry Beaded Ornament is a string of alternating small red and large white beads with a green wooden leaf and red wooden oval on either end. The oval features black script lettering that reads "merry." This unique ornament was designed by Michelle Kildow and measures 21" high by 3" wide and 0.25" deep.
Material: Wood and string
Designer: Michelle Kildow
Dimensions: 21" H. x 3" W. x 0.25" Dp.

The Penguin Ornament is a stuffed felt penguin that features stitched on accents included a Santa hat, a yellow beak, and a green scarf. This ornament hangs from a thin string and measures 4.75" high.
Material: Felt and string
Designer: Suzie Pienta
Dimensions: 4.75" H.

The Hope Snowman Ornament is a stuffed felt snowman that features stitched on accents including a black top hat, orange nose, and green scarf. A safety pin on the scarf holds a small paper tag that reads "Hope." The ornament hangs from a thin string hanger. It was designed by Suzie Pienta and measures 4.75" high.
Material: Felt, safety pin, and paper
Designer: Suzie Pienta
Reads: "Hope"
Dimensions: 4.75" H.

The Felt Christmas Ornaments are a set of stuffed felt winter classics including a snowman, a penguin, and a gingerbread man. Each of the ornaments feature stitched on accents such as hats, facial features, hats, scarves, etc. These ornaments were designed by Suzie Pienta and hang from simple string hangers.
Materials: Felt and string
Designer: Suzie Pienta
Dimensions: 4.75" H.

column1: Happy Snowman Mason Jar Ornaments - 3 Asst
column4:
The Happy Snowman Mason Jar Ornaments is an assortment of three wooden ornaments in the shape of mason jars that have been painted white and each feature a snowman illustration. Each ornament hangs from a wire hanger and have black lettering on the bottom of the snowmen. They read either "Snow ALL DAY PLEASE," "MERRY winter," or "WARMEST wishes." They were designed by Barbara Lloyd and measure 4" high by 2.75" wide and 0.25" deep.
Materials: Wood and wire
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads: "Snow ALL DAY PLEASE," "MERRY winter," or "WARMEST wishes."
Dimensions: 4" H. x 2.75" W. x 0.25" Dp.

The Happy Snowman Snowflake Ornament are an assortment of three wooden snowflakes that have been painted white and distressed for a more rustic look. Each snowflake has a wooden snowman head with black top hats glued to the front. The ornaments hang from a red buffalo check fabric hanger and measure 4" high by 2.75" wide and 0.25" deep.
Materials: Wood and fabric
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Dimensions: 4" H. x 2.75" W. x 0.25" Dp.

The Angel's Name Ornament is an assortment of three wooden angel ornaments that have been painted black with grey snowflake designs on the borders, wire halos, and jute hangers. Each ornament shows white lettering in the center that reads either "MY ANGEL'S NAME IS Grandma," "MY ANGEL'S NAME IS Mom," or "Friends ARE ANGELS ON EARTH." They were designed by Barbara Lloyd and measure 6.75" high by 5.75" wide and 0.25" deep.
Materials: Wood, wire, and jute
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads: "MY ANGEL'S NAME IS Grandma," "MY ANGEL'S NAME IS Mom," or "Friends ARE ANGELS ON EARTH"
Dimensions: 6.75" H. x 5.75" W. x 0.25" Dp.

The Spool Snowman Ornament is an assortment of two wooden thread spools that have been painted white with a snowman face on the front and a jute string hanger with matching jute at the bottom that holds a rusty jingle bell. Each design has a black top hat spool, one is taller and more slender while the other is shorter and more stout. Each hat is trimmed with an artificial wreath and red pip berries. They were designed by Michelle Kildow and measure 5.75" high by 2" in diameter.
Materials: Wood, jute, and metal
Designer: Michelle Kildow
Dimensions: 5.75" H. x 2" Dia.

The Dear Santa Beaded Ornaments are an assortment of three wooden ornaments that have been painted white and feature a festive Christmas phrase written in either white or green lettering. A wire hanger holds white, grey, and green wooden beads that was attached to each of the sides of the ornament. The first ornament reads "EAT, DRINK, and GET YOUR merry ON!" in green lettering. The second ornament reads "Dear Santa, I've been -> naughty. (and it was worth it!)" in white lettering. The third ornament reads "Dear Santa. We've been GOOD~ish." in green lettering. It measures 4" high by 5.25" wide and 0.25" deep.
Materials: Wood and wire
Designer: Michelle Kildow
Reads:
"EAT, DRINK, and GET YOUR merry ON!"
"Dear Santa, I've been -> naughty. (and it was worth it!)"
"Dear Santa. We've been GOOD~ish."

column1: The Cat Christmas Tags - Set Of 4
column4:
The Cat Christmas Tags are a set of 4 round wooden tags that have been painted white and printed with designs that each feature cat silhouettes and Christmas. The first depicts a cat in front of pine greenery and reads "MAY YOUR TREE SURVIVE THE CAT THIS YEAR" in red lettering. The second depicts a cat pawing at a red ornament on a pine branch beneath the green and red lettering that reads "Dear Santa, It was the cat." The third shows a cat laying on the floor beneath the phrase "AND NOT A SINGLE fa la la WAS GIVEN -the cat" that is framed by pine greenery. The fourth features two paw prints beneath red and green lettering that reads "Dear Santa, I deserve more kitties." The tags were designed by Barbara Lloyd and measure 3" in diameter by 0.25" deep.
Materials: Wood and fabric
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads:
"MAY YOUR TREE SURVIVE THE CAT THIS YEAR"
"Dear Santa, It was the cat."
"AND NOT A SINGLE fa la la WAS GIVEN -the cat"
"Dear Santa, I deserve more kitties."
Dimensions: 3" Dia. x 0.25" Dp.

column1: The Dog Christmas Box Signs - 3 Asst
column4:
The Dog Christmas Box Signs are an assortment of three freestanding wooden signs that have been painted white and printed with silhouettes of dogs and festive holiday phrases in red and green lettering. The first depicts a fluffy dog and reads "WOOFING YOU A DOGGONE Merry CHRISTMAS! - The Dog." The second depicts a small dog wearing a mistletoe bunch on its neck and reads "MERRY CHRISTMAS from SANTA'S LITTLE YELPER." The third depicts a dog's head with snowflakes along it's neckline and reads "PEACE LOVE AND BELLY RUBS!" The signs were designed by Barbara Lloyd and measure 8" high by 6" wide and 1.5" deep.
Material: Wood
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads:
"WOOFING YOU A DOGGONE Merry CHRISTMAS! - The Dog"
"MERRY CHRISTMAS from SANTA'S LITTLE YELPER"
"PEACE LOVE AND BELLY RUBS!"
Dimensions: 8" H. x 6" W. x 1.5" Dp.

column1: The Dog Christmas Tags - Set Of 4
column4:
The Dog Christmas Tags are a set of 4 round wooden tags that have been painted white and printed with designs that each feature illustrations of dogs and Christmas phrases printed in red and green lettering. The first shows a dog silhouette sitting next to a pine tree branch with red ornaments on the ground alongside the phrase "Dear Santa, It was the dog. Yours Truly, - The Cat." The second shows a paw print next to the phrase "It's okay... they will just think Santa ate them. -THE DOG." The third design features a silhouette of a fluffy dog alongside a phrase that reads "WOOFING YOU A DOGGONE Merry CHRISTMAS! -The Dog." The fourth design features an illustration of a dog bone and reads "Dear Santa, I deserve more puppies." The tags hang from red buffalo check fabric and measure 3" in diameter and 0.25" deep.

Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads:
"Dear Santa, It was the dog. Yours Truly, - The Cat"
"It's okay... they will just think Santa ate them. -THE DOG"
"WOOFING YOU A DOGGONE Merry CHRISTMAS! -The Dog"
"Dear Santa, I deserve more puppies."

column1: The Cat Christmas Box Signs - 3 Asst
column4:
The Cat Christmas Box Signs are an assortment of three freestanding wooden signs that have been painted white and printed with silhouettes of cats and festive holiday phrases in red and green lettering. The first depicts a cat wearing a red collar with a small bunch of holly leaves and berries attached and reads "DEAR SANTA DON'T FORGET THE CAT." The second sign shows only a cat's back legs, tail, and a paw print beside the phrase "LEAVE THE PRESENTS and GO AWAY - THE CAT." The third sign shows a cat's upper body and a pine branch with a red ornament that the cat is playing with, it reads "Low hanging ornaments Popcorn on strings Say your goodbyes To your favorite things." The signs were designed by Barbara Lloyd and measure 8" high by 6" wide and 1.5" deep.
Material: Wood
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads:

column4:

An illustration of a snowman wearing a black top hat and red and green scarf is printed on the front beneath the black script phrase "Let It Snow." The freestanding sign was designed by Dianna Swartz and measures 5.75" square by 2" deep.

Designer: Dianna Swartz
Reads: "Let It Snow"

A jute string has been tied around the metal accent at the top, holding a black wooden tag that reads "Believe" in white lettering. The sign was designed by Dianna Swartz and measures 8" high by 4.5" wide and 0.5" deep.

Designer: Dianna Swartz
Reads: "Believe"

column4:
