A jute string has been tied around the metal accent at the top, holding a white painted wooden tag that reads "Home for the Holidays" in black lettering. The sign was designed by Dianna Swartz and measures 8" high by 4.5" wide and 0.5" deep.

column4:

A potted Charlie Brown style Christmas tree is printed on the front beneath the black script phrase "O Christmas Tree." The freestanding sign was designed by Dianna Swartz and measures 5.75" square by 2" deep.

Reads: "O Christmas Tree"

column1: Give Thanks For The Harvest Easel Sign - 3 Asst
column4:
The Give Thanks for the Harvest Easel Sign is an assortment of three wooden framed signs that have been painted white and printed with festive autumn designs. The first sign features illustrations of golden wheat stocks and a loaf of bread on the edges of the large orange, brown, and yellow lettering that reads "GIVE US THIS DAY OUR DAILY BREAD." The second design features a bright orange vintage-style truck that is hauling gourds, grains, and sunflowers alongside white stalk illustrations and the colorful lettering that reads "GIVE THANKS for the HARVEST." The third design is the simplest with a single pumpkin illustration beneath bold orange lettering that reads "HAPPY HARVEST." The signs each feature a sawtooth hanger on the back and a peg that can be inserted into a hole on the bottom to allow it to sit on its own as an easel. They were designed by Barbara Lloyd and measure 6" high by 8" wide and 0.75" deep.
Material: Wood
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads:
"GIVE US THIS DAY OUR DAILY BREAD"
"GIVE THANKS for the HARVEST"
"HAPPY HARVEST"
Dimensions: 6" H. x 8" W. x 0.75" Dp.

column1: Fall I Love You Box Sign
column4:
The Fall I Love You Box Sign is a freestanding wooden box sign that has been printed with an orange and white buffalo check pattern and a cutout circle that reveals a Fall pattern beneath. The shiplap-look in the cutout features an illustration of a pumpkin and orange and black lettering that reads "Fall i love you." The sign was designed by Barbara Lloyd and measures 7.5" square by 1.5" deep.
Material: Wood
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Reads: "Fall i love you"
Dimensions: 7.5" Sq. x 1.5" Dp.

column1: Joy To The World Box Sign - 2 Asst
column4:
The Joy to the World Box Sign is an assortment of two wooden box signs that each feature a festive burgundy-colored frame, white slat wood background, and a distressed printed farm animal scene with winter accents. The first design shows a vintage red truck with a pig in the cab and a chicken in the bed in front of a large tree with a star at the top. Grey lettering above the truck reads "all roads lead home for christmas." The second design features two cows, the larger is wearing a wreath with green leaves and red berries around its neck while the smaller cow is wearing a pair of mittens around its neck. Red lettering above the cows reads "Joy to the world." They each measure 7" square by 1.5" deep and hang from a sawtooth hanger.
Materials: Wood
Reads: "all roads lead home for christmas" or "Joy to the world"
Dimensions: 7" Sq. x 1.5" Dp.
Hanger: Sawtooth

column1: Believe In The Season Box Sign - 2 Asst
column4:
The Believe in the Season Box Sign is an assortment of two wooden box signs that each feature a festive burgundy-colored frame, a white slat wood background, and distressed grey printed farm animal stacks with winter accessories. The first design shows a chicken holding a star in its beak standing on a pig wrapped in holiday lights that is standing on the back of a cow wearing a Santa hat. Red lettering beneath the animals reads "believe in the season" in a simple script font. The second design shows a chick and a chicken, both wearing Santa hats, standing on the back of a cow that is wearing a green and red striped scarf. Red lettering above the cow's head reads "Merry & Bright" in a simple script font. They each measure 7" Square by 1.5" deep and hangs from a sawtooth hanger.
Material: Wood
Reads: "believe in the season" or "Merry & Bright"
Dimensions: 7" Sq. x 1.5" Dp.
Hanger: Sawtooth

column1: Twisted Flame Timer Taper - Burnt Mustard 6"
column4:
Our 6" taper is dipped in wax with wax drippings down the sides and a grungy texture for a primitive look. It features a twisting stretched flame tip that gives this candle the look of a flickering flame.
Timer directions: Twist bottom of the candle to turn on. The candle will stay lit for 6 hours, then automatically shut off for 18 hours. To change the time sequence, simply turn the candle off and turn back on at desired time.
Requires 2 AA batteries (not included)

The Aberdeen Sea Holly Wreath is an artificial wreath that features ivory colored fluffy flowers alongside green plastic and fabric leaves that are all attached to a brown twig wreath base. It has a 12" inside diameter and a 20" outside diameter.

It is made from artificial succulent leaves and coral colored buds on a green plastic stem. It can be displayed in a jar or milk can and measures 8" high by 2" wide.

column1: Best Friends Are Flakes Blocks - 3 Asst
column4:

The first design shows a collection of three snowmen singing Christmas carols with the unique lyrics "let it snow! let it snow! somewhere else!" The second design features a single snowman looking up at the sky with the phrase "some of my best friends are flakes." The third design also features a single snowman, this one with its eyes covered by a hat and the phrase "I'm sorry for what I said when it was winter!" These blocks hang from a single keyhole hanger on the back and measure 4" square by 0.75" deep.

"some of my best friends are flakes"
"I'm sorry for what I said when it was winter!"

column1: Hug In A Mug Cocoa Plates - 3 Asst
column4:
The Hug in a Mug Cocoa Plates are an assortment of three oval decorative wooden plates that each feature a hand painted illustration of a snowman sitting inside of a plaid patterned mug and surrounded by white dot snowflakes. The first plate has been painted a taupe color and depicts a snowman wearing a toboggan style hat sitting inside of a red, yellow, and brown patterned plaid mug. White lettering above the snowman reads "It's hot chocolate season!" The second plate has been painted grey and depicts a snowman wearing a red stocking hat with a matching red scarf sitting inside of a navy blue, yellow, taupe, tan, and red patterned plaid mug. White lettering above the snowman reads "It's a hot cocoa kind of day!" The third plate has been painted tan and depicts a snowman wearing a beanie style hat with a matching scarf sitting inside of a grey, red, and navy plaid mug. White lettering above the snowman reads "A hug in a mug!" The plates were designed by Michelle Kildow and measure 11" high by 7.75" wide and 0.75" deep.

Designer: Michelle Kildow
Reads:
"It's hot chocolate season!"
"It's a hot cocoa kind of day!"
"A hug in a mug!"

The Farm Animal Winter Plate is an assortment of three decorative wooden plates that have been painted grey and white with dot snowflakes and hand painted illustrations of farm animals and winter accents. The first plate features a sheep that is wearing a Santa hat and red scarf with a stack of presents on its back that read "JOY," "LOVE," or "PEACE." The second plate features a chicken pulling a wagon that is hauling a snowy pine tree. The wagon reads "FARM FRESH" in white lettering. The third plate features a pig wearing a green stocking hat, a green, white, and red scarf, and cardinals are perching on its head. The pig is standing on a red sled that reads "Sleigh all day." The plates were designed by Dianna Swartz and measure 9.75" in diameter by 0.75" deep.
Material: Wood
Designer: Dianna Swartz
Reads:
"JOY" "LOVE" and "PEACE"

The second plate has a green, tan, white, and red plaid rim, a grey center with white snowflakes, and a snowman sitting inside of a red mug that reads "cocoa is the key to my heart" in white lettering. The second dog is a grey and white dog with floppy ears that is wearing a Santa hat and a red coat with a yellow collar. column4:

The center of the plates have been decorated with painted snowmen in three different designs: the first snowman is wearing a green scarf and a black top hat with a red bird perched on the rim beside white lettering that reads "Merry." The second snowman is wearing a red scarf and a matching red toboggan hat. The snowman is surrounded by a painted green wreath and white lettering that reads "Cheer." The third snowman is wearing a red scarf and a birdhouse is perched on its head with black lettering that reads "Joy" above it. column1: Live Laugh Love Pillar - Burnt Ivory
column4:
This is our 3" x 3-1/2" flat-top pillar candle that features a grungy textured wax coating on the outside, and a smooth wax coating on the inside with a flame shaped lightbulb. Around the pillar the textured coating is smoothed out and the words "Live Laugh Love" are printed on the candle.
Directions:
Our timer pillars have two separate Äúon" functions. By switching to the Äú1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching to the Äú2" position, the timer function is activated.

The timer function means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on to repeat the cycle. The time that you originally flip the switch to the Äú2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the desired time.

Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).

Battery-operated 5" taper with a grungy texture and flame-shaped tip is affixed to a 3" black resin base. Color is Burnt Mustard. Total height is 6".
How our Timer Tapers work:
Stays lit for 6 hours then shuts off for 18 hours. The cycle repeats every day. The time you originally turn the candle on is the time it will come on each day.
To reset the time, simply turn the candle off and turn back on at the desired time.

Measures 36" wide by 9" high and .75" deep.

Wood cutout of a primitive sheep is painted cream and distressed, and features the word "Welcome" painted in a whimsical font. Sheep's head is a separate cutout and painted black to give this sign a dimensional look. A wire loop serves as a hanger. Accented with strands of raffia. Measures 10" H x 11" W.

Our fluffy squirrel ornament is a stuffed squirrel covered in gray felt fabric with a very fluffy tail made of faux fur. A natural jute string is attached for hanging.
Fluffy measures 4" high (height of tail) by 5" wide.

column1: One Cup At A Time Plaques - 3 Asst.
column4:
An assortment of 3 ivory wooden cutout coffee mugs measuring 10-1/2" W x 9-1/4" H that have a distressed look and each has a different phrase on enjoying life:
"Take Life One Cup at a Time"
"Good Friends, Good Coffee, Good Life"
"This House run on...Love, Laughter, & Coffee"
Sawtooth hangers in back.

Our Boo Word sitter is made of resin and is painted black with distressed edges. This item measures 3.5" H x 4" W x .75" D. Place it on a side table, shelf or mantle for a fun Halloween accent.
Material: Resin
Size: 3.5" H x 4" W x .75" D
Color: Black

column1: Milk, Eggs, Bacon Box Sign, 3 Asst
column4: Our Milk, Eggs, Bacon Box Sign is an assortment of 3 signs, each featuring a rustic hand drawn illustration of a cow, chicken, or pig. These wooden signs have a primitive, aged finish over a cream-color background and measure 8" squared with a 1-1/2" edge for self-standing or hanging.

column1: Live, Laugh, Love Mini Stick, 3 Asst.
column4:
An assortment of 3 wood mini sticks, each featuring the words "Live Laugh Love" linked together in an arrow design in three different colors: white, sage or tan. Distressing around the edges and throughout give these mini sticks a modern rustic look.
Sticks measure 6" W x 1" H x .25" D.

column1: Faith, Family, Friends Mini Stick, 3 Asst.
column4:
An assortment of 3 wood mini sticks, each featuring the words "Faith Family Friends" separated by red or gold stars in three different colors: black, taupe or white. Distressing around the edges and throughout give these mini sticks a modern rustic look.
Sticks measure 6" W x 1" H x .25" D.
Atop a wooden base is black metal script spelling the word, "Home". This piece is meant to be freestanding on your mantel or tabletop. The entire piece measures 12" W x 5.5" H x 2" D.
Atop a wooden base is black metal script spelling the word, "Gather". This piece is meant to be freestanding on your mantel or tabletop. The entire piece measures 12" W x 5.5" H x 2" D.
Atop a wooden base is black metal script spelling the word, "Blessed". This piece is meant to be freestanding on your mantel or tabletop. The entire piece measures 12" W x 5.25" H x 2" D.
Atop a wooden base is black metal script spelling the word, "Faith". This piece is meant to be freestanding on your mantel or tabletop. The entire piece measures 12" W x 5.5" H x 2" D.

column1: It's The Season Winter Framed Wall Sign
column4: A wintry, forest scene complete with a blue sky, fallen snow, and a cheerful snowman is framed by light, distressed wood. The words, "It's The Season" are beautifully scripted along the bottom of the design. With the frame, this sign measures 16.75 inches tall by 13 inches wide. This piece was designed for The Hearthside Collection by Michelle Musser.

For the coffee-lover, this 11" x 9" sign shows a steaming cup of coffee on a patterned background with the phrase "Good Morning Gorgeous." A brown, distressed wooden frame completes this sign with a sawtooth hanger in the back.

column1: Love You More Than Coffee Framed Sign
column4: For the coffee-lover, this 11" x 9" sign shows a steaming cup of coffee on a patterned background with the phrase "Love you more than coffee." A brown, distressed wooden frame completes this sign with a sawtooth hanger in the back.

"Kiss me under the light of a thousand stars," reads our Thousand Stars Box Sign in simple black lettering. Opposite the text, the box features a cutout of a star in the lower right corner. It has a textured whitewash finish over natural, slatted wood and measures 8" squared.

Our Take Flight Box Sign pictures a cutout of a bird in flight in the lower right corner. This box has a textured whitewash finish over natural, slatted wood. It reads "let your dreams take flight" in simple black lettering in the top left corner. This box sign measures 8" squared.

Our Beautiful Ride sign is made of wood surrounded by a natural wood frame. Sporting a distressed white slat board look, it is decorated with a hand drawn illustration of a bicycle along with the following phrase:
"Life Together
is a beautiful Ride"
Sawtooth hanger on back. Sign measures 8" square by 1.5" in depth.

A pressed wood sign featuring a wood plank look with a watercolor sunflower and the words "Welcome to Our Home" printed in decorative lettering. Distressed metal strips accent the ends.
Sign measures 18-1/2" wide by 7" high. Two triangle hooks in back.

An assortment of 4 signs made of pressed wood are painted ivory with black lettering and border. These adorable signs have the look of vintage street signs that will create a touch of simpler times in any decor.
Double keyhole hanger in back (as shown in secondary image). Measures 11-1/2" W x 3-3/4" H x 1/2" D.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Life is an Adventure Ornament is an oval-shaped wooden board that has been printed to look like white wood slats.
The ornament features an illustration of a vintage-inspired bicycle with a basket full of flowers alongside the script lettering that reads "life is an adventure and I'd go anywhere with you!"
The ornament is hung from a natural jute rope tied through the predrilled hole at the top.
This ornament was designed by Barbara Lloyd and measures 6.25" high by 3.5" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Buffalo Check Tree Ornament is accented with four buttons for a primitive appearance. It is made from soft, buffalo check fabric that has been lightly stuffed, and includes a string hanger for easy display. Measures 4" H by 2.75" wide.
Material: Fabric, buttons, jute string
Size: 4.5" H x 3.25" W
Colors: Red, Black

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4: This grouping of ornaments comes as an assortment of three different designs. Each measures 4" squared and hangs from a wire hanger that has been fastened to either top corner of the sign with a rustic curl. The signs read "thank you," "thinking of you," and "love you so," respectively.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
This Fabric Dog Ornament adds a fun, pet lover look to Christmas trees and holiday decor. The dog head-shaped ornament is made of a combination of herringbone and felt fabric and has been lightly stuffed for a three dimensional appearance. He's got tiny black bead eyes and his Santa hat is accented with holly leaves with three tiny jingle bells. This ornament hangs by a jute string and measures 4.75" H x 5.75" W.
Material: Fabric
Size: 4.75" H x 5.75" W
Color: white, brown, red, green
Designer: Suzie Pienta

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
This Cat Ornament adds a fun, pet lover look to Christmas trees and holiday decor. The cat head-shaped ornament is made of felt fabric and has been lightly stuffed for a three dimensional appearance. His face and ears have a gold buffalo check pattern and he's accented with tiny black bead eyes. This ornament hangs by a jute string and measures 4" H x 4.5" W.
Material: Fabric
Size: 4" H x 4.5" W
Color: gold, ivory, red, brown
Designer: Suzie Pienta

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Christmas Wish Mitten Ornament adds a cozy look to Christmas trees and holiday decor. The mitten shaped fabric ornament has been lightly stuffed for a three dimensional appearance. It has a red plaid pattern with an ivory felt top. It's accented with a gold wooden star on a swatch of moss and a craft paper name tag attached by a safety pin. This ornament hangs by a jute string and measures 5" H x 3" W.
Material: Fabric
Size: 5" H x 3" W
Color: white, red, black, ivory
Accents: Wooden star, moss, name tag
Designer: Suzie Pienta

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Snowman w/Tree Ornament adds a cozy look to Christmas trees and holiday decor. The fabric ornament has been lightly stuffed for a three dimensional appearance. He has a green felt Christmas tree attached to his front and he's wearing a brown felt scarf and has an orange nose. Felt holly leaves accent his black top hat. This ornament hangs by a jute string and measures 5" H x 3" W.
Material: Fabric
Size: 5" H x 3" W
Color: Ivory, brown, black, green, orange
Designer: Suzie Pienta

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Cardinal Ornament is a primitive fabric cardinal that has been stuffed and hung from a black string for easy display. The cardinal has a moss accent glued to the bottom for the appearance of a nest. It measures 3" high by 5" wide and was designed by Kitty Johnson.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
Our Antique Snowflake Ornament is a snowflake shape ornament made of felt fabric with simple stitching around the edges. The middle of the ornament is lightly stuffed for a dimensional look. It hangs on a jute string and measures 4.75" in diameter.
Material: Felt Fabric
Color: Tan
Size: 4.75" Dia
Designer: Suzie Pienta

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Santa Wish Ornament adds a cozy look to Christmas trees and holiday decor. The Santa shaped fabric ornament has been lightly stuffed for a three dimensional appearance. He is made of white and red felt fabric and has the word "wish" stitched to his beard in tan thread. Felt holly leaves accented by two tiny jingle bells adorn his red hat. This ornament hangs by a jute string and measures 5" H x 4" W.
Material: Fabric
Size: 5" H x 4" W
Color: white, red, peach, green
Designer: Suzie Pienta

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
This charming Snowman Head Ornament will brighten any holiday tree! Made from stuffed fabric, this dapper snowman wears a fabric top hat and matching scarf. It is accented with a rosy cheeks, a stitched smile, button eyes, and a carrot nose. The included string hanger makes for easy display and it measures 6" high by 3.5" wide.
Material: Fabric, mesh, jute string
Size: 6" H x 3.5" W
Colors: White, black, red
Designer: Kitty Johnson

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Believe Star Ornament adds a cozy look to Christmas trees and holiday decor. The fabric ornament has been lightly stuffed for a three dimensional appearance, and accented with five rusty bells at each point. The word "Believe" is stitched on one side and it comes with a string hanger for easy display. Measures 6.5" in diameter.
Material: Fabric, metal
Size: 6.5" Dia.
Color: Ivory

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Accents|Ornaments & Tree Tags|(Newest) Additions
column4:
The Happy Hallowine Beaded Ornaments are an assortment of three wooden ornaments that have been painted orange and feature a wine-loving Halloween phrase written in either white or black lettering. A wire hanger holds white, orange and black wooden beads that is attached to each side of the ornament. The first ornament reads "happy HALLOWINE!" in white lettering. The second ornament reads "I'M HERE FOR THE BOOS" in black lettering. The third ornament reads "WILL TRADE candy for wine" in white lettering. Each measures 4" high by 5.25" wide.
Materials: Wood and wire
Designer: Michelle Kildow
Reads:
"happy HALLOWINE!"
"I'M HERE FOR THE BOOS"
"WILL TRADE candy for wine"
Dimensions: 4" H. x 5.25" W. x 0.25" Dp.
Standing resin sign featuring a distressed finish measuring approx. 14.5" L in 3 assorted colors: black, burgundy and mustard (click on thumbnail image to view all colors).

column1: Happy Home Happy Life Inset Box Sign
column4:
A freestanding box sign printed with a wood grain style and an olive green border. The white script font reads Happy home happy life surrounding a heart cutout that reveals an image of a house. It measures 7.75" square by 1.5" deep.
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Material: Wood
Dimensions: 7.75" Square x 1.5" Dp.

column1: Everything I've Ever Wanted Inset Box Sign
column4:
A freestanding box sign printed with a wood grain style and an olive green border. The white script font reads This is everything I've ever wanted surrounding a cutout image of a house. It measures 7.75" square by 1.5" deep.
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Material: Wood
Dimensions: 7.75" Square x 1.5" Dp.

Slat sign measuring 45" W x 9-1/2" H is made of pressed wood with a natural wood grain. It displays the phrase "Bless this Home", with the word "Bless" made out of corrugated metal. The different textures of the metal and wood gives this sign a unique look that will add style to any home decor.

A wooden freestanding block with chevron designs on both sides, each featuring a mixed font phrase about home.
It reads:
It's good to be home
our home is where my (heart shape) is
Material: Wood
Dimensions: 5.75" Square x 1" Dp.

Our Family Wall Hanger is made of black metal and spells the word "Family" is script lettering. A bronze colored distressed metal star dots the "i." Two keyhole hangers are in back. This metal sign would look wonderful hanging in a foyer, kitchen, fireplace mantel or any smaller wall space.
Measures 14" W x 5-1/2" H.

column1: Do What Brings You Joy Framed Sign
column4: The Do What Brings you Joy Framed Sign is a square wooden sign that has been painted to look like white wooden slats and printed with a classic design surrounded by a light wooden frame. The design features an illustration of a simple farmhouse next to a full tree above grey lettering that reads "Do what brings you joy." This sign was designed by Barbara Lloyd and measures 12.25" high by 12.25" wide and 1.25" deep.

column1: The Years Are Short Inset Box Sign
column4:
A freestanding box sign printed with a wood grain style and an olive green border. The white script font reads The days are long but the years are short surrounding a cutout image of a house. It measures 7.75" square by 1.5" deep.
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Material: Wood
Dimensions: 7.75" Square x 1.5" Dp.

column1: Life Is A Journey Rectangle Block - 2 Asst
column4:
An assortment of two white rectangular wooden blocks, each featuring a phrase about life printed in various fonts.
They measure 2.5" high by 7" wide and read:
Live like someone left the barn door open
Life is a journey enjoy the ride together
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Material: wood
Dimensions: 2.5" H x 7" W

column1: Home Is My Happy Place Rectangle Block - 2 Asst
column4:
An assortment of two white rectangular wooden blocks, each featuring a phrase about happiness printed in various fonts.
They measure 2.5" high by 7" wide and read:
Do what brings you joy
Home is my happy place
Designer: Barbara Lloyd
Material: wood
Dimensions: 2.5" H x 7" W

Ghost Timer Taper is a 6" taper with a textured wax coating and a flame-shaped tip. It has a built-in timer that casts its flickering light for 6 hours and then cuts off for 18 hours. Timer repeats daily at the same time, but can be reset by shutting the taper off and turning it back on at the desired time. It has a ghost face motif perfect for fall decorating and requires 3 AA batteries (not included).
Candle holder sold separately (Items #46237 or #46218)

column1: Bless This Home Crow Timer Pillar
column4:
This is our 3" x 4-1/2" wave-top pillar candle that features a grungy textured wax coating on the outside, and a smooth wax coating on the inside with a flame shaped amber lightbulb. There is an area on the pillar where the textured coating is smoothed out and the words "Bless This Home" along with a crow silhouette with a primitive star hanging from its beak are printed on the candle.
Directions:
Our timer pillars have two separate ‚Äúon" functions. By switching to the ‚Äú1" position, the timer pillar will remain on until you turn it off. By switching to the ‚Äú2" position, the timer function is activated.

The timer function means the candle stays on for 6 hours, goes off for 18 hours, and then automatically turns back on to repeat the cycle. The time that you originally flip the switch to the ‚Äú2" position will be the time it comes on each day. If you wish to reset the timer, turn the candle off and back on at the desired time.

Our Basketweave Pillar Candles are battery operated candles that are coated in a burnt ivory wax, then stamped with a basketweave texture. With a flame shaped bulb emitting an amber glow and dark distressing on the pattern to enhance its dimension, these candles have a truly unique and rustic look. A timer function is included by selecting "On 2," with 6 hours on and 18 hours off. Selecting function "On 1" will give a continuous glow. Require 3 AAA batteries.
Pillar size is 4" H x 3" W.

Our Beige 6" taper has a dripped wax look with a flickering stretched flame tip that gives this candle a truly primitive look (candle is not dipped in wax).
Timer directions: Twist bottom of the candle clockwise to turn on. The candle will stay lit for 6 hours, then automatically shut off for 18 hours. To change the time sequence, simply turn the candle off (twist counter clockwise) and turn back on at desired time.
Requires 2 AA batteries (not included)

Our Burnt Mustard Home Timer Taper is a 6" battery-operated timer taper with a rough, textured wax coating. It's flame-shaped tip casts a soft, flickering glow. It has a built-in timer that stays on for 6 hours and then off for 18 hours that repeats daily at the same time. The time can be reset by turning the taper off and turning it back on at the desired time. It reads, "home" in black lettering and requires 3 AA batteries (not included).

The time can be reset by turning the taper off and turning it back on at the desired time. It reads, "blessed" and requires 3 AA batteries (not included).

The time can be reset by turning the taper off and turning it back on at the desired time. It has a crow motif and requires 3 AA batteries (not included).

Wooden plate with a tan rim features a primitive illustration by designer Michelle Kildow of an angel with a heart on her dress and the phrase "Wishing you Days filled with Joy." Plate has a slightly rough texture with light distressing around edges. Plate measures 11" in diameter.
(For decorative use only. Do not use with food)

Family Gathers Here Block is a black, wooden box sign with areas of brown distressing. Block features the phrase, "Family Gathers Here," and is accented with silver embellishment on each side. Block is freestanding and measures 2¬Ω" high by 23¬Ω" wide and 1¬Ω" deep.

This heart warming sampler is made of stretched burlap fabric hand stitched with a tree and flower garden and the words:
"The seasons may change,
but their beauty remains constant
in the garden."
Sampler is enclosed in a natural wood frame with black distressing and a glass front. Sawtooth hanger in the back along with a small peg that fits in at the bottom of the frame for sitting.
Measures 9" high by 11" wide. Designed by Lisa Johnson.

This heart warming sampler is made of stretched burlap fabric hand stitched with a tree with orange and green felt leaves and the words:
"The mountains started
with one grain of sand,
the rivers, with one drop
of rain,
the mighty oak, from
a single seed.
Just start with your dream."
Sampler is enclosed in a natural wood frame painted green and distressed with a glass front. Sawtooth hanger in the back along with a small peg that fits in at the bottom of the frame for sitting.
Measures 14-1/2" high by 12-1/2" wide. Designed by Lisa Johnson.

column1: Frost On The Pumpkin Wooden Wall Sign
column4: This thin, wooden wall sign has a burgundy background with additional teal, yellow, and orange color. The words, "Frost on the Pumpkin" complete the sign and a frosted pumpkin serves as the "O" in "Frost". The sign measures 7.75 inches in height and 11 inches in width and comes with an attached jute rope hanger for easy display. This piece was designed for The Hearthside Collection by Dianna Swartz.

A framed piece of burlap fabric with the word "welcome" written in script. The brown wood frame features dimensional tan wooden stars and is hung by a jute rope.
Material: fabric and wood
Dimensions: 5.25" H x 7" W
Jute Rope Hanger
Designer: Michelle Kildow

column1: Home Sweet Home Hanging Framed Sign
column4:
A framed piece of burlap fabric with the words Home Sweet Home written in script. The wood frame features dimensional white wooden stars and is hung by a jute rope.
Material: fabric and wood
Dimensions: 7" H x 5.25" W
Designer: Michelle Kildow

Cherry Bug Doll is an adorable lady bug doll wearing a black cotton dress with cherries on it and featuring rusty wire antennas and black net wings. Her floppy arms and legs are made of distressed black canvas and her legs are formed to sit in the "crisscross applesauce" style. Painted on big brown eyes give Cherry Bug a wide-eyed childlike appeal. A weighted bottom gives stability when sitting.
Measures 19" tall. Designed by Joyce Napotnik.

These wooden block signs are painted white and distressed. They have a white plaque attached to the front with a printed phrase and a wooden charm that hangs by a metal hook. These signs come 2 assorted. The signs read:
Hello Sunshine (sun charm)
Love (heart charm)
Signs measure 4-1/2" high by 6-1/4" wide by 1-1/2" deep.

This thick, pressed wood cutout of a pumpkin is beautifully designed and has the words "Happy Fall Y'all!" The sign shows an autograph of the artist who designed it, Michele Musser, which will attract customers that are looking for one-of-a-kind items.
Sign measures 15-1/2" wide by 11-1/2" high by 1/2" thick and has a sawtooth hanger in back.

column1: Welcome Collage With Burlap Pocket Sign
column4:
A collage of words on wood with a burlap pocket at the bottom, tied with a jute string that holds on a rusty metal star. The collage is hung from a metal wire on the top.
A sample of the words from the collage are:
welcome, faith, family, home sweet home, gather, God bless, hope, believe, etc.
Material: Wood, burlap, and metal
Dimensions: 13" H x 5.5" W
Designer: Michelle Kildow

Wood leaf ornaments. The set is made up of 4 different designs that are all beautifully carved with vein accents. Cream string is used as the hanger. They are light weight, and would hang great anywhere!

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: Our Willow Leaf Branch is an everyday floral that makes a great addition to any arrangement. With a brown stem and green willow leaves that have a slight whitewash, it adds a nice rustic touch to your florals. Measures 20" high.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: This vintage-inspired metal post box is the perfect piece for farmhouse Christmas decorating. It is embossed with decorative flourishes and a bird in flight, with the word "POST" in bold lettering. The body is painted red with rusty detailing, and the top flap is a rusty color that lifts open. Includes a pre-drilled hole for hanging. Measures 15.5" high by 10.75" wide and 3.25" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: This vintage-style post box features a rounded top and green distressed paint that looks perfectly weathered and rustic. It is made out of embossed metal that includes intricate designs of florals and a bird in flight. Features a hinged door that opens and a small handled mail slot. This post box can be hung or stand alone. Measures 13.75" high by 9.5" wide and 3" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: Our Aged Green Post Box is the perfect vintage-meets-farmhouse piece that will take you back to a simpler time. Painted green with a weathered look of rusty distressing, it features a hinged front flap that opens, allowing for storage or displaying decorative florals. The flat back and a pre-drilled hole make for easy hanging. Measures 15.5" high by 10.75" wide and 3.25" deep

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: This Blue Divided Pail is made of distressed metal with rusty accents and features a carrying handle and 4 equal sections. Great for displaying florals (sold separately) or for storing art or office supplies. Measures 7.5" high by 7.75" wide and 6" deep overall. Each storage section is 4.5" high by 3.75" wide and 2.75" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: Our Galvanized Basket, 2/set comes with two, different-sized metal baskets. The simple construction and rustic, industrial style of these baskets makes them suitable for display on the wall or tabletop in any farmhouse or country home. It measures 5 ¬º" squared x 2" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Cathedral Window Box is perfect for displaying potted plants or florals. Available in two assorted designs, they are intricately cut from wood in farmhouse-inspired designs. They each have a jute handle on either side for added detail. Can be added to a window sill or mantel display for a one-of-a-kind look. Measures 4.5" high by 4.5" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: Keep clutter at bay with the colorful Junk Hider Boxes. Perfect for the office or kitchen, they are made from wood with a distressed finish and available in three assorted designs. Colors include yellow, coral, and navy blue. A wooden plate is adhered to the front and is printed with the phrases "Odds & Ends," "Junk Hider," and "All the Small Things." Each box measures 4.5" high by 4.5" wide by 4.5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: This freestanding resin accent piece features a cow, pig, sheep, and rooster stacked on top of one another. Made from resin with a glossy cream finish, it has light brown distressing for a vintage feel. It measures 7" high by 4" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The set of three Small Wooden Star Ornaments are painted in three farmhouse colors including pewter, stoneware, and soft white. They each come with a jute hanger to accent trees, florals, hooks, and more. The wooden stars measure 2" in diameter, with a 3" jute hanger.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Apparel|(Newest) Additions
column4: The burlap Farmer's Market Tote Bag features ivory fabric trim accents, and two light brown leather carrying straps. The tote makes for a lovely, upscale grocery or shopping bag, and reads, "farmers market" in bold black lettering over a vintage truck graphic. It measures 17" high by 13" wide by 8" deep, and is lightweight, yet durable.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Enamel Soap Dish with Carrier is a fun and functional soap dish for a bathroom or kitchen. It features a galvanized metal base with a removable enamel tray for with textured ridges to keep soap in place. With the appearance of a classic wash tub basin, the base has two handles and reads, "soap" in black lettering. Base measures 1.5" high by 7" wide by 3.5" deep, and the tray measures 2" high by 5.5" wide and 3.5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The metal Iron Bathtub Soap Dish adds vintage charm to a master or guest bathroom. The freestanding mini bathtub has a clawfoot design with painted black feet and a black rim to contrast its light gray finish. At 2" high by 5.5" wide by 2.5" deep, it is the perfect size for holding a bar of soap.

column1: Good Morning Shiplap Block Sign, 3 Asst.
column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Good Morning Shiplap Block Sign is available in three assorted designs and printed with uplifting phrases. The freestanding blocks have a crisp, white painted finish and features an engraved finish for the look and feel of shiplap. Phrases include, "rise and shine," "it's a brand new day," or, "wake up birthday" in black lettering. They each have a keyhole slot for the option to display on a wall, and they measure 3.75" square by .5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Toilet Block Sign is made from wood and is available in two assorted designs. Phrases include, "Nice butt," or "hello, sweet cheeks" in bold lettering on either a black or white background. The freestanding blocks have unfinished, natural toned wood edges that look great when displayed on a bathroom countertop. Measure 3" high by 5.75" wide by .75" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Vintage Blue Metal Basketweave Pot is a cylindrical metal container with a dimensional basketweave pattern. The entire pot has been painted blue, scuffed, and rusted inside and out for an antique look. It measures 4.75" high by 5.5" wide and 5.5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Galvanized Metal Olive Bucket is a functional accent for displaying florals, or for storing small items in the home or office. It has an unfinished, galvanized finish with small cut-out slits for a traditional olive bucket look. It is small enough to be displayed in any room and measures 5.25" high by 4.5" in diameter.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Garden|(Newest) Additions
column4: Carolina Dill Ring is a perfect accent to candles and lends a pop of color to any space with its soft green leaves. It features faux dill leaves arranged on a twig base and looks great set on an entryway console or hung as a mini-wreath. It has an inside diameter of 2" and measures 10" in diameter overall.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Medium Wooden Star Ornaments come in a set of three star cut-outs in shades of pewter, stoneware, and soft white. The wooden ornaments have a lightly distressed finish, and each come with a jute rope hanger for easy display. Stars measure 3" in diameter, and the hanger is approximately 3" long.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Seasonal|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Mulberry Petite Hydrangea Pick is a bright floral made of dusty mauve-colored fabric petals and leaves on a flexible plastic stem. Pick is perfectly sized for placing in a jar or milk can and makes a great addition to a table setting. Measures 10" high by 4" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The adorable Freestanding Mug Sign is the perfect accent for a coffee bar or kitchen counter. Available in four assorted designs, each wooden block stand on their own and are cut into the shape of a coffee mug. Printed in white lettering, phrases include, "Coffee is always a good idea," "Life begins after coffee," "Rise & grind," or, "I like coffee, and maybe 3 people". They each measure 4" high by 4.25" wide by .5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Never Forget Stacking Sticks come in a set of two stackable blocks that when displayed together read "These Are The Days I Never Want To Forget". The unique navy-colored wooden blocks are freestanding with lightly distressed edges that provide inspiration to any space. Measuring 2.75" high by 7.5" wide by .5" deep, these sticks can act as a striking centerpiece or a beautiful accessory.

column1: So Good To Be Home Stacking Sticks, 2/set
column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The set of two So Good to be Home stacking Sticks stack on top of one another to create a unique tabletop display. The freestanding wooden sticks have a warm gray finish with distressed edges and when displayed together read "It is so good to be home" in cream lettering. They measure 2.75" high by 7.5" wide by .5" deep overall when stack together.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: Add a pop of color to an office or living room with the Always Smile Box Sign. Coral colored polka dots accent the slat-wooden background, and it is layered with a coordinating three-dimensional wooden circle that reads "Always Smile." The freestanding box sign measures 7.25" high by 7.75" wide by 1.5" deep and comes with a sawtooth hanger on the back for the option to display on a wall. Sign features a white painted frame with lightly distressed edges.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Choose Happy Box Sign adds inspiration to any room in farmhouse style. Made with the look of slat wood, the shadowbox has a white frame with natural toned wood inside for a dimensional appearance. A bold, diagonal design in navy blue accents the interior, which is overlaid with a blue circle of wood printed with the phrase "Choose Happy" in a cheerful script. It comes with a sawtooth hanger on the back for easy wall display, but can also stand on its own to accent tabletops or shelves. Measures 7.25" high by 7.75" wide by 1.5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: Add color and inspiration with The Be a Light Box Sign. The framed wooden box sign can be freestanding or may hang from the included sawtooth hanger. A circular, three-dimensional wooden layer is painted yellow to resemble a sun, and reads "Be a Light" in script white lettering. It is displayed in a white wooden frame that has a natural finish inside for added contrast. Measures 7.25" high by 7.75" wide by 1.5" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Work Feelings Cube adds humor and color to any office! Made from wood, the six-sided cube is printed with a different, humorous work-themed phrase on each side alongside abstract pops of color. Phrases include "Another day of outward smiles and inward screams," "I work well with others....when they leave me alone," "I may shake things up at the office today by being in a good mood," and more. It is 4" high by 4" wide by 4" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Girl Boss Block Sign makes a great gift for hardworking women. The freestanding white block has a subtle polka dot pattern and lightly distressed edges. It can be displayed on a desk or tabletop, and is printed with the phrase "Girl Boss" in fun, coral lettering. Measures 3.75" high by 3.75" wide by .75" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: World's Okayest Block Signs make humorous office gifts! Available in two assorted designs, the freestanding wooden blocks are printed with the phrases "World's Okayest Employee," and "World's Okayest Boss." The fun coral and navy shades will add a pop of color desks and tabletops. They each have a keyhole hanger on the back for the option to hang, and measure 2.75" high by 3.75" wide by .75" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: Add a cozy touch to home decor with the Farmhouse Shiplap Box Signs. Featuring an assortment of three designs, they are made from wood with the look and feel of shiplap. The signs have lightly distressed edges and can either be displayed freestanding or on a wall. Phrases include, "We are Simply Blessed," "Love Rules This Farmhouse," and "Farmhouse Blessed Farmhouse". They are 5.75" high by 5.75" wide by 2" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The humorous Mom 24:7 Framed Sign is made of wood with a sawtooth hanger on the back for easy display. It features a white weathered frame and is printed with the phrase "Thou Shalt Not Try Me. Mom 24:7," in black distressed lettering. It has a modern look and feel, and measures 5.75" high by 7.75" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Grandma Life Framed Sign makes a lovely gift for grandmothers. Made from wood, it is mounted in a chippy white frame and reads "Love this Grandma life." It has a sawtooth hanger at the back for wall display and measures 5.75" high by 7.75" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions

This wooden sitter is cut with a staggered design and features a white, chippy paint finish with distressed edges. It reads, "All you need is love" in black lettering, and measures 3.5" high by 10" wide by .75" deep.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Blended & Blessed Framed Sign is perfect for blended families. It comes with a sawtooth hanger for easy wall display and looks great when displayed with family photos. 5.75" high by 7.75" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions
column4: The Let's Stay Home Staggered Block Sitter adds a farmhouse touch to living room decor. It comes with two sawtooth hangers on the back for easy wall display, and measures 18.5" high by 24.5" wide.

column3: (All) The Hearthside Collection|Col House Designs|Signs & Wall Accents|(Newest) Additions

Margo is a primitive doll made of distressed fabric with a stitched-on face with button eyes. Her cotton gingham dress is accented with black buttons and has cinched sleeves and a tie at the neck with ivory pantaloons underneath. She's got black yarn hair that's tied in pigtails with strips of fabric that match her red dress. Her hands at stitched together and they are holding a grapevine wreath.
Margo measures 21" tall.

Our fabric-covered Annie Doll is reminiscent of vintage Raggedy Ann dolls! She's got burgundy yarn hair and big painted-on blue eyes. She's wearing a green dress with an off-white apron accented with buttons and plaid patches. Her floppy legs have red stripes to resemble stockings and black painted on shoes. A weighted bottom gives Annie stability when sitting. She measures 18" tall.

column1: Hug In A Mug Decorative Bowls - 3 Asst
column4:
3 Wooden bowls that show a colored border with coffee beans, a complimentary main color and design in the bottom of the bowl. Each design features a phrase about coffee.

a hug in a mug
mom fuel
coffee makes me awesomeMaterial: Wood
Dimensions: 5.5" Diameter

Jessica Doll sits at 22" tall, and wears a lovely floral dress with pantaloons. She's got a red felt purse hanging across her body that's accented with white stitching and a white button. Her red hair made of yarn hair is pulled into pigtails that are tied with strips of fabric that match her dress. Her floppy legs and arms makes sitting easy and Jessica would be the perfect addition to any primitive decor.
Designed by Kitty Johnson.

Ann is a primitive doll that is covered in a tea stained cotton fabric, She features button eyes, floppy arms and legs and a weighted bottom for sitting. She wears a coral flower print dress with a lace collar and matching hair bows in her red yarn hair. She also holds a leash in one hand and her companion, Barney the Dog, under her other arm. Ann measures 19" high by 8" wide and 5" deep overall, or 9.25" high in a seated position
For decorative use only. Keep away from children.

Charlotte Pig is a stuffed doll covered with an aged, distressed cotton fabric and accented with a curly, metal wire tail. Her body is wrapped with dyed cheesecloth that's secured with gold twine and pinned with a paper name tag for a primitive look.
Measures 5" high by 7.5" wide and 2.75" deep.

Pork Chop Pig is a stuffed doll covered in aged, cotton fabric. His middle is wrapped in tweed fabric secured with twine and he has a rope tail and wooden stick legs. Pork Chop wears a jingle bell collar with a paper name tag pinned on the side.

Measures 6" high by 7.5" wide and 1.75" deep.

Angels can't be everywhere

I distressed piece of white wood is attached that has the word "harvest" written in black. The ornament hangs by a jute rope. It measures 5.25" H x 4.25" W x 1.25" D.

He is wearing a red and white striped scarf around his neck with a safety pin accent that is holding a craft paper name tag. He measures 8 inches high and 6 inches wide from foot to foot. Tyke Bear is just the right size to add a nostalgic look to a shelf or small alcove.

Size: 8" H x 6" W
Color: Brown with red and white scarf
Designer: Joyce Napotnik

Brewster is a primitive style stuffed bear covered in fuzzy brown fabric with sewn-on arms and legs in the sitting position. He is wearing a dark brown scarf around his neck with a safety pin accent that is holding a craft paper name tag. He measures 12 inches high and 6 inches wide from foot to foot. Brewster Bear will add an old-fashioned nostalgic touch to any primitive/rustic decor.

She is wearing a brown plaid dress with wooden buttons, and has a stuffed sunflower with a fabric tie attached to her right arm. A safety pin accent that is holding a craft paper name tag is the finishing touch to this nostalgic look. She measures 11.5 inches high when sitting (18" with legs straight out) and approx. 10 inches wide. Hershey will add an adorably nostalgic touch to your primitive/rustic decor.

Size: 11.5" H (18" with legs out) x 6" W

Our Snowman Winter Storm doll is part of our Sprinkles Collection. He is a snowman made of fleece fabric that's accented with a black fabric top hat that has a tan fabric trim with berries and greenery and a swatch of fabric snow accents. He's wearing a fabric brown scarf and has black buttons down his middle. In his wooden stick arms he is holding a broom made of wood and twine. A pointy wooden nose and craft paper name tag attached by a safety pin sum up the finishing touches of this primitive doll. A "sprinkle" of iridescent glitter give Snowman Winter Storm his luminous glow. Measures 11.75" H x 7" W (width of arms included).
Material: Fabric, wood, twine, plastic, paper, metal
Size: 11.75" H x 7" W (including arms) x 2.75" D
Designer: Joyce Napotnik
Weighted bottom for stability

Our Sprinkles Cardinal Friend is a primitive snowman made of fabric that's accented with a black fabric top hat that has a red trim and a tiny cardinal sitting on the rim. He's wearing a knitted red scarf and has black buttons down his middle. He is holding a brush pine tree and a red Christmas bulb that is also covered in sparkles. His legs are attached to a resin stand that's accented with berries and greenery. As the name entails, Sprinkles Cardinal Friend is finished off with a "sprinkle" of iridescent glitter for a luminous glow. Measures 11.5" H x 3.25" W.

Our Giving Sprinkles doll is a primitive snowman made of fabric that's accented with a fluffy white fabric hat that's accented with a red button at the top and berries and holly leaves on the brim. She's wearing a knitted red scarf accented with berries and holly leaves around her neck and has two black buttons down her middle. Her fabric-covered wire arms are holding a fabric-wrapped present and there is a basket of berries and pine needles at her feet. Her legs are attached to a resin stand and she has a craft paper name tag that's attached by a safety pin. As the name entails, Sprinkles Giving is finished off with a "sprinkle" of iridescent glitter for a luminous glow. Measures 10" H x 4" W x 4" D.
Material: Fabric, wood, plastic, metal, paper, resin
Size: 10" H x 4" W x 4" D
Designer: Joyce Napotnik

She's wearing a green checkerboard dress with a lace collar over top of orange striped pantaloons. Black vinyl lace up boots and ribbed socks cover her feet. In her arm she is holding a wooden spoon and a bag of sugar, ready to take on the kitchen! This adorable doll will easily sit on a shelf and would make for the perfect accent in any country kitchen!
Measures 25.5" high.

The "Eat" Wooden Cutout Wall Hanging is the perfect piece for a cozy and relaxed kitchen look. Made of lightweight and durable wood this sign has been whitewashed for a weathered finish. Henry hangs by a string for use as an ornament or for wall hanging. Measures 6" high by 3" wide and 2" deep.

Rolling Pin Mouse is a plush doll covered in an aged fabric with a weighted bottom for stability. She is wearing a primitive floral print dress, a cheesecloth scarf with a clothespin accent around her neck, and she holds a distressed wooden rolling pin under one arm. She has string whiskers, metal wire arms, and a long, jute rope tail. She also wears a tag that says "Mouse with Rolling Pin." She would add a fun, whimsical touch to any country kitchen.
Measures 7" high by 4" wide and 3.5" deep.

Laura Ruby is a fabric doll with red yarn hair and stitched facial features giving her a primitive look. She is wearing a distressed plaid fabric dress with black buttons and lace trim, and her floppy legs are printed with striped stockings and black Mary Jane shoes. Laura Ruby measures 15" high by 5" wide, or 8.25" high in a seated position.
For decorative use only.

Material: Cotton, Straw
20.5" Height
Metal pail and pitchfork attached
Name tag attached
Floppy Legs
Weighted Bottom
For decorative use only. Not for children.

Miss Thomas has a primitive look with button eyes, floppy arms and legs and a weighted bottom for easy positioning. She wears wire framed glasses, a plaid dress, and black boots with lace socks. In her arms she holds a wooden 'chalkboard' with the phrase, "School's open," written on it, and a No. 2 pencil. With her paper name tag printed on her dress she is ready for the first day of school. Miss Thomas measures 20" high by 6.5" wide and 2.5" deep overall. She is 11.5" high in a seated position.

Our Ghost Ornaments come packaged as a set of 3 in a cellophane bag with a black ribbon tie. They are made of rough cut pieces of tan fabric gathered around a soft ball and tied with a gold mesh fabric strip. Two black eyes are printed on the fabric and they hang on a jute string. These adorable ornaments have a vintage handmade look and the packaging makes for a great way to display them in your store. Each ornament measures 4" H x 2" W.

Size: 4" H x 2" W
Colors: tan, gold
Designer: Dawn Stake

It features a .25" thick wooden disc on front that is painted off white with a snowman face and the word "Merry" is printed on the slat wood in soft white. The ornament hangs by a jute rope. Size: 5.25" H x 4.25" W x .75" D

She is wearing a green gingham jumper with button accents and she's holding a stuffed slice of watermelon in her hands. Her burgundy yarn hair is pulled into pigtails. She's got large blue painted-on eyes and she's wearing a craft paper name tag pinned to her dress. A weighted bottom gives her stability when sitting. Mandy is just as adorable as can be!
Measures 18" high.
Primitive stuffed heart covered in red felt fabric has a distressed gauze ribbon wrapped around accented by a rusty metal bell. Hangs on a simple string. Measures 7" H x 6-1/2" W.

Size: 7" H x 6.5" W

Milk Maid Doll is a canvas-covered stuffed doll wearing blue jean overalls and a beige shirt. On her head she's got red yarn pigtails that are topped with a red kerchief.
